要让发条机械运转，必须由另一个生物用一把独特的钥匙给它上发条。这需要1分钟时间。一旦上紧发条，它们能在列出的时间内活动，通常为24小时，时间耗尽之后它们就无法察觉周围的环境且无法行动，直到再次被上紧发条。一些发条机械的能力在使用时需要以减少活动时间为代价。它们消耗的活动时间不能超过当前剩余的活动时间，一旦活动时间为0，它们就会立即关机。如果不清楚发条机械上一次上发条是什么时候，大多数发条机械的管理员都会在早上8点上发条。

有些发条机械在上发条能力中列出了“待机”条目，它们可以通过一个3动作行动进入待机模式。在待机模式下，它的活动时间不会减少，但它可以感知周围环境（察觉检定有-2减值）。它无法行动，只有一个例外：当它感知到一个生物时，能以一个反应动作退出待机模式（并且如果状况合适，则进行先攻检定）。

一个生物可以尝试对上了发条的发条机械进行解除装置，解除DC在上发条能力中列出。每次成功的尝试都能减少发条机械1小时活动时间。这对于处于待机模式中的发条机械也能正常生效。

+2 Status to Fortitude Saves vs. Disarm.name: 对抗卸武时强韧豁免+2状态加值

Brace Door.name: Brace Door
Brace Door.description: The door warden holds shut an adjacent door. This ends the door warden's turn. Until the start of its next turn, as long as it remains functional and in the same square, other creatures trying to get through must succeed at a @Check[type:athletics|dc:21|traits:action:force-open] check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SjmKHgI7a5Z9JzBx]{破拆 Force Open} the door。

Slam Door.name: Slam Door
Slam Door.description:
触发 The door warden Pushes a creature through an open doorway

效果 The door warden slams the door shut on the creature

Uncertain Operation.name: Uncertain Operation
Uncertain Operation.description: At the beginning of its turn, the compromised door warden rolls [[/r 1d4 #Uncertain Operation]] to determine how many actions it has for that turn (to a maximum of 3 actions per turn). The door warden's Speed each turn is 10 feet times the result of that same die roll, to a maximum of 25 feet per turn (that is, a roll of 3 or 4 indicates a Speed of 25 feet)。

Corrupt Shieldmarshal (Clan Pistol).name: Corrupt Shieldmarshal (Clan Pistol)
Corrupt Shieldmarshal (Clan Pistol).senses: + 20 to Sense Motive or vs. Conceal An Object

Firearms Critical Specialization.name: 火器重击专精 Firearms Critical Specialization
Firearms Critical Specialization.description: When the shieldmarshal makes a critical hit with a firearm weapon, the target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:25]豁免否则@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}。

Lawbringer.name: 执法者 Lawbringer
Lawbringer.description: The shieldmarshal marks a foe for judgment, granting the shieldmarshal a +10-foot circumstance bonus to Speed whenever it Strides toward that creature. The shieldmarshal's Strikes against that creature deal an additional 2d8 precision damage。

Reloading Strike.name: Reloading Strike
Reloading Strike.description: The shieldmarshal makes a melee Strike against an opponent within reach and Interacts to reload a firearm in their other hand。

Corrupt Shieldmarshal (Jezail).name: Corrupt Shieldmarshal (Jezail)
Corrupt Shieldmarshal (Jezail).senses: + 20 to Sense Motive or vs. Conceal An Object

Firearms Critical Specialization.name: 火器重击专精 Firearms Critical Specialization
Firearms Critical Specialization.description: When the shieldmarshal makes a critical hit with a firearm weapon, the target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:25]豁免否则@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}。

Lawbringer.name: 执法者 Lawbringer
Lawbringer.description: The shieldmarshal marks a foe for judgment, granting the shieldmarshal a +10-foot circumstance bonus to Speed whenever it Strides toward that creature. The shieldmarshal's Strikes against that creature deal an additional 2d8 precision damage。

Reloading Strike.name: Reloading Strike
Reloading Strike.description: The shieldmarshal makes a melee Strike against an opponent within reach and Interacts to reload a firearm in their other hand。

Cranium Preserver.name: Cranium Preserver
Cranium Preserver.publicNotes: Cranium preservers serve necromancers as walking laboratories for undead. A typical cranium preserver has a metallic and spider-like body, which holds aloft a large central glass vat surrounded by a dozen or more smaller, head-sized glass vats. Each vat is filled with a special embalming fluid that can preserve the minds of slain enemies。

Undead Crafter.name: Undead Crafter
Undead Crafter.description: The cranium preserver knows one version of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.c3b6LdLlQDPngNIb]{Create Undead} ritual for every four heads it has preserved (a typical cranium preserver has 12 preserved heads). The cranium preserver can use its heads to make separate rolls as both the primary and secondary casters of the ritual。

Jettison Cranium.name: Jettison Cranium
Jettison Cranium.description:
The cranium preserver ejects one of its preserved-head jars at a point within 100 feet. The jar explodes, and all creatures in a @Template[type:burst|distance:10] must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:28] save。

大成功 生物不受影响。

成功 The creature takes [[/r {2d8}[mental]+{2d8}[negative]]]{2d8 mental damage and 2d8 negative伤害}。

失败 The creature takes [[/r {4d8}[mental]+{4d8}[negative]]]{4d8 mental damage and 4d8 negative伤害}. The discharged mental anguish released from the preserved head causes the creature to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} for 1 round。

大失败 The creature takes [[/r {8d8}[mental]+{8d8}[negative]]]{8d8 mental and 8d8 negative伤害}. The discharged mental anguish released from the preserved head causes the creature to become confused for 2 rounds。

Slosh.name: Slosh
Slosh.description:
Whenever the cranium preserver ends a Stride, the movement causes necrotic embalming fluid and preserved body parts to slosh about and spill from its central vat. Each creature adjacent to the cranium preserver when it finishes its Stride must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:26] save。

大成功 生物不受影响。

成功 The creature takes [[/r {1d8}[mental]+{1d8}[negative]]]{1d8 mental damage and 1d8 negative伤害}。

失败 The creature takes [[/r {2d8}[mental]+{2d8}[negative]]]{2d8 mental damage and 2d8 negative伤害}。

大失败 The creature takes [[/r {4d8}[mental]+{4d8}[negative]]]{4d8 mental and 4d8 negative伤害}. If the creature is alive, the preserved body parts sense the presence of a living creature and cling to it, causing the creature to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2} for 1 round。

Daelum.name: Daelum
Daelum.publicNotes:
During the height of the legendary war between Nex and Geb, Nex's agents grew increasingly creative in their "recruiting" methods for their armies. One such effort involved the construction of mechanical soldiers powered by arcane engines but directed by transplanted minds. While the process generally involved willing donors who were eager to give up dying bodies to \"live on\" in constructed frames, rumors persist that Nex harvested the minds of prisoners of war and criminals for these creations。

Today, thousands of years after those wars ended, hundreds of daelums still live. Their intellects have, in large part, fully embraced their new "lives," and very few remember their previous existences today. Daelums can be found throughout the Mana Wastes serving as guides, porters, mine workers, and mercenaries。

Belly Hatch.name: Belly Hatch
Belly Hatch.description: The daelum can Interact to stow or remove an item from their belly hatch, which can hold up to 10 Bulk。

Gallop.name: Gallop
Gallop.description:
需求 The daelum is in quadruped form

效果 The daelum Strides twice. They have a +10-foot circumstance bonus to their Speed during these Strides。

Shift Form.name: Shift Form
Shift Form.description: The daelum transforms into a quadruped. While in this form, their Speed increases by 10 feet and they don't count the contents of their belly hatch against the total amount they can carry. The daelum can make hoof Strikes in quadruped form, but not pick or claw Strikes. Using this ability again returns the daelum to their bipedal form。

Smog Cloud.name: Smog Cloud
Smog Cloud.description:
The daelum unleashes a cloud of smog in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10]. The cloud persists for 3 rounds, but doesn't move with the daelum. All creatures within the cloud are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed}. A creature that begins its turn in the smog cloud must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:18] save (creatures that must breathe and don't hold their breath take a -2 circumstance penalty on their save)。

大成功 No effect and temporarily immune for 1 hour。

成功 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}。

失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2}。

大失败 The creature is sickened 2 and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}。

Dewey Daystar.name: 杜威·晨星 Dewey Daystar
Dewey Daystar.blurb: 男性仙人掌莱西赏金猎人

Spiny Body.name: 多刺躯体 Spiny Body
Spiny Body.description: 仙人掌莱西全身覆盖着尖刺。擒抱仙人掌莱西的生物受到[[/r {1d8+3}[piercing]]]{1d8+3穿刺伤害}。

Verdant Burst.name: 翠绿爆发 Verdant Burst
Verdant Burst.description: 当杜威死亡时，它的身体会爆发出一阵原能能量，@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]范围内的所有植物生物都恢复[[/r 2d8 #Hit points]]生命值。该区域会长出仙人掌，变为困难地形。如果地面环境不适合仙人掌生存，它们会在24小时之后枯萎。

Disgorged Zombie.name: Disgorged Zombie
Disgorged Zombie.publicNotes: Shock zombies are hideous undead covered with bolts and electrical wiring. Most have two large electric coils mounted on their backs to absorb and project electricity. If uncontrolled, shock zombies often wander far afield in search of inventors' labs or lightning storms to draw power from. In a pinch, the natural electric currents inside living creatures more than suffice。

Electricity Absorption.name: Electricity Absorption
Electricity Absorption.description: For 1 minute after taking electricity damage, a shock zombie loses its usual @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} condition, gains the ability to use reactions, and gains a +10-foot status bonus to its Speed。

Lightning Powered.name: Lightning Powered
Lightning Powered.description: Arcs of restorative electricity jolt between shock zombies. For each shock zombie within 30 feet, the shock zombie gains fast healing 2 (to a maximum of fast healing 10)。

Slow.name: Slow
Slow.description: A shock zombie is typically @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} and can't use reactions (but see electricity absorption)。

Amnesia Venom.name: Amnesia Venom
Amnesia Venom.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:29]

最大持续时间 6 rounds

阶段1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} (1轮)

阶段2 flat-footed and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1} (1轮)

阶段3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused}, flat-footed, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2} (1轮)。

Drela.name: Drela
Drela.publicNotes:
Cutthroats, killers, thieves, and toughs prey upon the vulnerable of society. Directing their activities and keeping them in line are the duties of the gang leader。

Villains pursue selfish and cruel goals, trampling over anyone foolish or purehearted enough to stand in their way。

Deny Advantage.name: Deny Advantage
Deny Advantage.description: The gang leader isn't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} to creatures of 7th level or lower that are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden}、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected}, flanking, or using surprise attack。

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: When the gang leader rolls a success on a Reflex save, they get a critical success instead。

Nimble Dodge.name: Nimble Dodge
Nimble Dodge.description:
触发 The gang leader is targeted with an attack by an attacker they can see

效果 The gang leader gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack。

Surprise Attack.name: Surprise Attack
Surprise Attack.description: On the first round of combat, if the gang leader rolls Deception or Stealth for initiative, creatures who haven't acted are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} to the gang leader。

Brutal Rally.name: Brutal Rally
Brutal Rally.description:
触发 The gang leader rolls a critical hit against a creature

效果 All allies that can see the gang leader gain a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls until the start of the gang leader's next turn。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.7x0O2GqWBJiAk5PF]{Effect: Brutal Rally}

Gang Up.name: Gang Up
Gang Up.description: Any enemy is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} against the gang leader's melee attacks due to flanking as long as the enemy is within melee reach of both the gang leader and one of the gang leader's allies。

Quick Draw.name: Quick Draw
Quick Draw.description: The gang leader @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interacts} to draw a weapon, then Strikes with that weapon。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description:
The gang leader deals an extra 2d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Explosive Steam Trap.name: Explosive Steam Trap
Explosive Steam Trap.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:18|traits:action:disable-a-device](受训)to disarm the desk switch; @Check[type:thievery|dc:28|traits:action:disable-a-device](专家)to disarm the trapdoor charge
Explosive Steam Trap.hazarddescription: A black‑powder charge fastened to a trapdoor (marked with a "T" on the map) blows a hole in a steam tunnel, filling the room with superheated steam。
Explosive Steam Trap.routine:
(1动作)The trapdoor emits a jet of superheated steam. Each creature in the room must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28] save。

大成功 生物不受影响。

成功 The creature takes [[/r {1d10+3}[fire]]]{1d10+3火焰伤害}。

失败 The creature takes [[/r {2d10+6}[fire]]]{2d10+6火焰伤害} and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded} for 1 round。

大失败 The creature takes [[/r {2d10+6}[fire]]]{2d10+6火焰伤害}, is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued}, and is blinded for 1 round。
Explosive Steam Trap.stealthdetails: (受训) to find the desk switch; @Check[type:perception|dc:28|traits:action:seek](专家)to find the trapdoor and charge

Explosive Charge.name: Explosive Charge
Explosive Charge.description:
触发 The desk switch is pressed or the trapdoor is opened

效果 The charge on the door explodes. All creatures within 10 feet take [[/r {2d10+6}[fire]+{1d10+3}[piercing]]]{2d10+6 fire damage and 1d10+3穿刺伤害}, and @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d6.success] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:22|basic:true]). The room is filled with steam, making all creatures within the room @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed}. The trap then rolls initiative。

Falling Portcullis Trap.name: Falling Portcullis Trap
Falling Portcullis Trap.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:27|traits:action:disable-a-device](专家)to disable the floor trigger, or @Check[type:athletics|dc:27] or @Check[type:engineering-lore|dc:27] to jam the portcullis in the ceiling
Falling Portcullis Trap.hazarddescription: An iron portcullis drops from the ceiling when a pressure plate is triggered。
Falling Portcullis Trap.stealthdetails: (专家) to spot the sockets in the floor where the portcullis drops; @Check[type:perception|dc:28|traits:action:seek](专家)to spot the floor trigger

Slam Shut.name: Slam Shut
Slam Shut.description:
触发 The pressure plate is depressed

效果 The portcullis falls, closing off the hallway. Any creature under the portcullis when it drops takes [[/r {4d10+18}[piercing]]]{4d10+18穿刺伤害} and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized}. A creature that succeeds at a @Check[type:reflex|dc:26] save takes no damage and rolls away in a random direction; on a critical success, they can choose the direction。

If the trap was triggered by a creature moving north with a Speed of at least 10 feet, they're considered to be under the portcullis when it triggers. Creatures moving south when triggering the portcullis aren't considered to be under the portcullis when it triggers。

False Door Trap.name: False Door Trap
False Door Trap.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:27|traits:action:disable-a-device|name:Disable a Device](专家)to disable the doorknob trigger
False Door Trap.hazarddescription: A black‑powder charge detonates as soon as the doorknob is turned, shattering the door into splinters。
False Door Trap.stealthdetails: (专家) to see the brick wall behind the edges of the door

Explosive Charge.name: Explosive Charge
Explosive Charge.description:
触发 The doorknob is turned

效果 The charge behind the door explodes, dealing [[/r {2d8+9}[fire]+{2d8+9}[piercing]]]{2d8+9 fire damage and 2d8+9穿刺伤害} to all creatures in a @Template[type:cone|distance:10] blasting outward from the door (@Check[type:reflex|dc:27|basic:true]). The sound of the explosion can be heard up to 50 feet away。

Follower of Shumfallow.name: 沙姆弗洛的追随者 Follower of Shumfallow

Verdant Burst.name: 翠绿爆发 Verdant Burst
Verdant Burst.description: 当沙姆弗洛的追随者死亡时，身体会爆发出一波治疗能量，@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]范围内的所有真菌生物都会恢复[[/r 1d8 #Hit points]]生命值。该区域内会充满真菌，变为困难地形。如果地形不适宜真菌生长，真菌会在24小时之后枯萎。

Change Shape.name: 变身 Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
沙姆弗洛的追随者变形为一株小型的巨蘑菇，或一块真菌。此效果类似@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.dileJ0Yxqg76LMvu]{树化术 Tree Shape}法术。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Pack Attack.name: 群起攻之 Pack Attack
Pack Attack.description: 沙姆弗洛的追随者的打击对于处于至少两名盟友触及范围内的目标造成额外1d4伤害。

Spores.name: 孢子 Spores
Spores.description: 受到姆弗洛的追随者的孢子荚打击的生物，必须通过@Check[type:fortitude|dc:15]豁免，否则受到[[/r {1}[persistent,poison]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续毒素伤害}。在持续伤害生效期间，受害者只能看见20尺内的东西（如果大失败则只有10尺）。

Shot of Opportunity.name: Shot of Opportunity
Shot of Opportunity.description:
需求 The Gilded Gunner has a loaded firearm in hand

触发 A creature within 30 feet uses a manipulate action, uses a move action, or makes a ranged attack

效果 The Gilded Gunner makes a ranged Strike against the triggering creature. If the attack is a critical hit and the trigger was a manipulate action, the Gilded Gunner disrupts that action. This Strike doesn't count toward the Gilded Gunner's multiple attack penalty, and its multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this Strike。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description:
The Gilded Gunner assassin deals an additional 2d6 precision damage to flat‑footed creatures。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description:
A Gilded Gunner goon's Strikes deal 1d6 additional precision damage to flat-footed creatures。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

equipment-Golden Silencer (Standard) (Af.name: 标准黄金消音器 Golden Silencer (Standard) (附着于决斗手枪)
equipment-Golden Silencer (Standard) (Af.description:
启动 1 交互

需求 你的隐秘达到专家熟练度

金枪客（Golden Gunners）因为在秘密抢劫行动中熟练使用这种消音器而让人胆寒。它能让枪声的巨响和受伤生物的尖叫都消失。装有黄金消音器的武器在开火时不会发出火光和噪音。被该武器远程打击命中的目标必须通过@Check[type:fortitude|dc:20]豁免，否则被沉默直到下回合开始。沉默的生物不能呼救或使用音波能力，也不能使用带有听觉特征的能力。这会阻止目标施放带有语言要素的法术。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description:
The safecracker deals an additional 1d6 precision damage to flat‑footed creatures。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Glass Buccaneer.name: Glass Buccaneer
Glass Buccaneer.publicNotes:
Clockwork buccaneers are powerful constructs designed for naval combat. Whereas most clockwork creations sink to the ocean floor while at sea, clockwork buccaneers can use their water jets to easily propel themselves through the water or leap aboard enemy ships. In addition to an internal water tank and hydraulic pumps, most clockwork buccaneers are equipped with a cutlass and arm gun loaded with scatter shot。

As one delves deeper into the industrial heart of Alkenstar, the clockwork adversaries one faces become ever more complex and deadly。

Wind-Up.name: 上发条 Wind-Up
Wind-Up.description:
24小时，@Check[type:thievery|dc:26|traits:action:disable-a-device], standby

要让发条机械运转，必须由另一个生物用一把独特的钥匙给它上发条。这需要1分钟时间。一旦上紧发条，它们能在列出的时间内活动，通常为24小时，时间耗尽之后它们就无法察觉周围的环境且无法行动，直到再次被上紧发条。一些发条机械的能力在使用时需要以减少活动时间为代价。它们消耗的活动时间不能超过当前剩余的活动时间，一旦活动时间为0，它们就会立即关机。如果不清楚发条机械上一次上发条是什么时候，大多数发条机械的管理员都会在早上8点上发条。

有些发条机械在上发条能力中列出了“待机”条目，它们可以通过一个3动作行动进入待机模式。在待机模式下，它的活动时间不会减少，但它可以感知周围环境（察觉检定有-2减值）。它无法行动，只有一个例外：当它感知到一个生物时，能以一个反应动作退出待机模式（并且如果状况合适，则进行先攻检定）。

一个生物可以尝试对上了发条的发条机械进行解除装置，解除DC在上发条能力中列出。每次成功的尝试都能减少发条机械1小时活动时间。这对于处于待机模式中的发条机械也能正常生效。

Spell Reflection.name: Spell Reflection
Spell Reflection.description:
触发 The glass buccaneer is targeted by a spell

效果 The buccaneer positions its reflective magical surfaces to turn the spell back on the caster. It tries to counteract the spell, making an Athletics check for its counteract check. If it successfully counteracts the spell, the effect is turned back on the caster。

Vulnerable to Shatter.name: Vulnerable to Shatter
Vulnerable to Shatter.description: The glass buccaneer is affected by the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.1xbFBQDRs0hT5xZ9]{Shatter} spell as though it were an unattended object。

Firearms Critical Specialization.name: 火器重击专精 Firearms Critical Specialization
Firearms Critical Specialization.description: When the buccaneer 用火器造成重击时，目标必须通过a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28]豁免否则@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}。

Pirate's Feint.name: Pirate's Feint
Pirate's Feint.description: The clockwork buccaneer @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{虚招 Feints}. If the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} to the buccaneer's melee attacks, it becomes flat-footed to the buccaneer's ranged attacks as well。

Refill Tank.name: Refill Tank
Refill Tank.description:
需求 The clockwork buccaneer is within 15 feet of a water source containing at least 100 gallons of water

效果 The clockwork buccaneer extends a clockwork tube and sucks up water to refill its water tank。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description:
The clockwork buccaneer deals an extra 2d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Water Jet.name: 喷水 Water Jet
Water Jet.description:
需求 The clockwork buccaneer has a full water tank

效果 The clockwork buccaneer fires a narrow but highly pressurized blast of water in a @Template[type:line|distance:60], dealing [[/r {10d6}[bludgeoning]]]{10d6钝击伤害} to creatures and unattended objects in the area (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:28|basic:true]; unattended objects automatically fail). Creatures and objects that fail the save are also knocked back 5 feet (10 feet on a critical failure). This empties the buccaneer's water tank。

Water Jump.name: Water Jump
Water Jump.description:
需求 The clockwork buccaneer has a full water tank

效果 The clockwork buccaneer jumps 60 feet, propelling itself through the air with a jet of water. This empties the buccaneer's water tank。

Wind-Up.name: 上发条 Wind-Up
Wind-Up.description:
24小时，@Check[type:thievery|dc:29|traits:action:disable-a-device], standby

要让发条机械运转，必须由另一个生物用一把独特的钥匙给它上发条。这需要1分钟时间。一旦上紧发条，它们能在列出的时间内活动，通常为24小时，时间耗尽之后它们就无法察觉周围的环境且无法行动，直到再次被上紧发条。一些发条机械的能力在使用时需要以减少活动时间为代价。它们消耗的活动时间不能超过当前剩余的活动时间，一旦活动时间为0，它们就会立即关机。如果不清楚发条机械上一次上发条是什么时候，大多数发条机械的管理员都会在早上8点上发条。

有些发条机械在上发条能力中列出了“待机”条目，它们可以通过一个3动作行动进入待机模式。在待机模式下，它的活动时间不会减少，但它可以感知周围环境（察觉检定有-2减值）。它无法行动，只有一个例外：当它感知到一个生物时，能以一个反应动作退出待机模式（并且如果状况合适，则进行先攻检定）。

一个生物可以尝试对上了发条的发条机械进行解除装置，解除DC在上发条能力中列出。每次成功的尝试都能减少发条机械1小时活动时间。这对于处于待机模式中的发条机械也能正常生效。

Spell Reflection.name: Spell Reflection
Spell Reflection.description:
触发 The glass elephant is targeted by a spell

效果 The elephant positions its reflective magical surfaces to turn the spell back on the caster. It tries to counteract the spell, making an Athletics check for its counteract check. If it successfully counteracts the spell, the effect is turned back on the caster。

Vulnerable to Shatter.name: Vulnerable to Shatter
Vulnerable to Shatter.description: The glass elephant is affected by the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.1xbFBQDRs0hT5xZ9]{Shatter} spell as though it were an unattended object。

Dual Tusks.name: Dual Tusks
Dual Tusks.description: The glass elephant makes two tusk Strikes, each against a different creature. This counts as one attack for the elephant's multiple attack penalty, and the penalty doesn't increase until after both attacks。

Grabbing Trunk.name: Grabbing Trunk
Grabbing Trunk.description: A Medium or smaller creature hit by the glass elephant's trunk is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}. If the elephant moves, it can bring the grabbed creature along with it。

Glass Sentry.name: Glass Sentry
Glass Sentry.publicNotes: Shifting back and forth between a detailed likeness of a human and a muted and featureless bipedal form, this creature of pure sand moves with an eerie grace. The sand sentry is often called upon by spellcasters to stand guard over an area of great importance-these elementals are patient participants in such roles, making them well suited for long-term service。

Glass Armor.name: Glass Armor
Glass Armor.description: When the sand sentry takes fire or lightning damage, its outer layer of sand fuses into sheets of hardened glass for 1 minute. This increases the sand sentry's AC to 26 and grants it resistance 5 to acid, cold, electricity, fire, force, piercing, and slashing damage. A sand sentry can't use earth glide while glass armor is active。

Blinding Sand.name: Blinding Sand
Blinding Sand.description: When the sand sentry critically hits with a fist Strike, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded} for 1 round。

Earth Glide.name: Earth Glide
Earth Glide.description: A sand sentry can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.H6v1VgowHaKHnVlG]{Burrow} through earthen matter, including rock. When it does so, it moves at its full burrow Speed, leaving no tunnels or signs of its passing。

Glaz Nixbrix.name: 格莱兹·尼克斯布里克斯 Glaz Nixbrix

strike-Really Big Gun.name: 大大枪 Really Big Gun
strike-Really Big Gun.description: (2 2动作)

Custom Armor.name: 改装护甲 Custom Armor
Custom Armor.description: 尼克斯布里克斯穿着只有他自己知道如何操作的改装护甲，这套护甲能赋予它物理抗力。一旦尼克斯布里克斯的生命值减少至一半以下，或在遭受重击伤害之后，它的改装护甲会破损，导致如下效果：它的AC减少至20，他失去物理抗力，他无法再使用大大枪，并且他的圆锯指虎不再能造成流血伤害。

Leap Away.name: 飞跃 Leap Away
Leap Away.description:
触发 尼克斯布里克斯被远程攻击作为目标；

尼克斯布里克斯跳跃，垂直移动最多10尺并且水平移动最多30尺，并且他对触发的攻击在AC上有+2环境加值。

Buzz-Saw Knuckles.name: 圆锯指虎 Buzz-Saw Knuckles
Buzz-Saw Knuckles.description: 尼克斯布里克斯有一对量身定做的圆锯指虎。只有他本人知道如何操作。

Escape Route.name: 逃生路线 Escape Route
Escape Route.description: 尼克斯布里克斯脚底抹油。他移动四次，每次使用下列动作之一：攀爬、跳跃、站立、快步或行走。

Knuckle Knock.name: 指虎爆轰 Knuckle Knock
Knuckle Knock.description: 尼克斯布里克斯行走、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{攀爬 Climbs}或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{跳跃 Leaps}一次，然后用圆锯指虎进行一次打击。只要打击成功命中，他会释放具有破坏力的黑火药爆炸，在打击完成后对目标和自身同时造成[[/r {1d6}[fire]]]{1d6火焰伤害}。然后他借着爆炸的推力，行走或跳跃一次。

Really Big Gun.name: 大大枪 Really Big Gun
Really Big Gun.description: 尼克斯布里克斯有一把改装的超级大枪，安装在改装护甲的肩部。只有他知道如何操作，这把枪在其他人手里是无法理解的。当尼克斯布里克斯发射大大枪时，装甲会自动会武器进行装填，但直到它的下个回合结束才能装填完毕。他最多只能每隔一轮发射一次。在所有弹药耗尽之前，他能使用此武器开火6次。

Gold Tank Broker.name: 金罐子经纪人 Gold Tank Broker
Gold Tank Broker.publicNotes:
发条生物在阿肯斯塔就像车和马在内海大多数地区一样常见。在霾都，发条装置从事着许多对工人来说非常无聊的机械性、重复性工作，同时也从事私人安保或反恐防暴等危险的工作。

在某地做看守最常由发条构装体最常见的职责。发条士兵通常成本太高而无法大规模租用，因此民间机构设计并采用一种便宜得多的发条保安，这是一种成本低廉的发条构装体，足以胜任捕鼠、守门和基本的巡逻工作。

发条保安通常被编程为针对某种特定情况作出有效反应，例如发现入侵者或攻击者时。为此，所有发条保安都配备了一个永燃火把，固定在他们带兜帽的灯笼状的头上。此外，大部分在公共场所使用的发条保安的拳头都被填充材料包裹，这能确保它们不会直接击毙犯罪嫌疑人，但是这样的改装是可以被移除的（从拳头打击中移除非致命特征）。非致命化处理被认为是最保险的，因为发条生物并不能总是准确区分罪犯和顾客。充足的绳索库存能让发条保安迅速将不守规矩的街溜子绳之以法。

Spotlight.name: 聚光灯 Spotlight
Spotlight.description: 发条保安能操作其头盔中内置的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.mRz8Jmk4Q06SsZpC]{永燃火把 Everburning Torch}照亮它检查的区域。当它搜索30@Template[type:cone|distance:30]时，如果在察觉检定中掷出成功，则得到大成功的结果。

Wind-Up.name: 上发条 Wind-Up
Wind-Up.description:
24小时，@Check[type:thievery|dc:15|traits:action:disable-a-device]检定，待机

要让发条机械运转，必须由另一个生物用一把独特的钥匙给它上发条。这需要1分钟时间。一旦上紧发条，它们能在列出的时间内活动，通常为24小时，时间耗尽之后它们就无法察觉周围的环境且无法行动，直到再次被上紧发条。一些发条机械的能力在使用时需要以减少活动时间为代价。它们消耗的活动时间不能超过当前剩余的活动时间，一旦活动时间为0，它们就会立即关机。如果不清楚发条机械上一次上发条是什么时候，大多数发条机械的管理员都会在早上8点上发条。

有些发条机械在上发条能力中列出了“待机”条目，它们可以通过一个3动作行动进入待机模式。在待机模式下，它的活动时间不会减少，但它可以感知周围环境（察觉检定有-2减值）。它无法行动，只有一个例外：当它感知到一个生物时，能以一个反应动作退出待机模式（并且如果状况合适，则进行先攻检定）。

一个生物可以尝试对上了发条的发条机械进行解除装置，解除DC在上发条能力中列出。每次成功的尝试都能减少发条机械1小时活动时间。这对于处于待机模式中的发条机械也能正常生效。

Gloves Off.name: 不戴手套 Gloves Off
Gloves Off.description: 和大部分发条保安不同的是，经纪人的打击没有非致命特征。

Hog-tie.name: 捆绳 Hog-tie
Hog-tie.description:
需求 发条保安正@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained}一个生物；

效果 发条保安切断其库存中的一段绳子，将被束缚生物的绳子捆起来。该生物会一直被束缚，直到它成功@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{逃脱 Escape}或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SjmKHgI7a5Z9JzBx]{破拆 Force Open}绳索，DC 15。一般来说，可以通过一次攻击骰，或贼活检定脱逃，或运动检定破拆；被束缚的生物在此检定中不会因为未使用撬棍而承受-2减值。绳索有2点硬度和8点生命值（BT4）。

Siren.name: 警笛 Siren
Siren.description: 发条保安持续发出响亮的噪声（类似警铃或尖锐的机械尖啸声），这可以让500尺内的任何人轻松听见。100尺内的生物，在基于听觉的察觉检定上有-2环境减值。30尺内的生物，如果未能通过@Check[type:fortitude|dc:14]豁免，则听不见警笛以外的任何声音，基于听觉的察觉检定自动大失败，并且免疫听觉效果。此效果持续到生物离开范围再加1轮之后。

Gold Tank Investor.name: 金罐子投资者 Gold Tank Investor
Gold Tank Investor.blurb: 各式各样的白领犯罪者

Gremlin Horde.name: Gremlin Horde
Gremlin Horde.disable: @Check[type:arcana|dc:25|name:Devise counter-hex symbols], @Check[type:occultism|dc:25|name:Devise counter-hex symbols], or @Check[type:religion|dc:25|name:Devise counter-hex symbols](受训)to devise counter-hex symbols that frighten and scatter a gremlin gang, or @Check[type:acrobatics|dc:28|name:Scatter a gremlin gang] or @Check[type:stealth|dc:28|name:Scatter a gremlin gang](专家)to capture and scatter a gremlin gang
Gremlin Horde.hazarddescription: Three gangs of gremlins hide within the spiral centurion, cackling with glee and hurling blasts of hex magic. The hazard occupies the same space as the spiral centurion, moving with it。
Gremlin Horde.reset: If not captured or killed, the scattered gremlin gangs regroup after [[/r 1d4 #Hours]]{1d4 hours}。
Gremlin Horde.routine:
(3 actions; misfortune) The gremlin horde hurls one tinkering curse with each action, targeting an item within 60 feet wielded or worn by a creature. The creature must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:27] save. The gremlin horde loses 1 action for each gremlin gang that's scattered。

大成功 The hex bounces back to affect the gremlin horde. For 1 round, all creatures gain a +1 status bonus to checks to disable this hazard。

成功 The item is unaffected。

失败 The item becomes unreliable for 1 round. If a creature attempts to Activate the item or Interact with it, it must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:5] or the action is wasted. If the item doesn't have an active use (such a mundane cloak), the creature wearing the item must instead immediately succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:5] or become tangled with the item and fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}。

大失败 As failure, but the creature wielding or wearing the item also becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2}。

Hexed Calamity.name: Hexed Calamity
Hexed Calamity.description:
触发 A creature comes within 30 feet of the gremlin horde

效果 Every firearm within 30 feet misfires. If a creature is holding the firearm, they can attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:27] save, negating this effect on a success. The hazard rolls initiative。

Firearms Critical Specialization.name: 火器重击专精 Firearms Critical Specialization
Firearms Critical Specialization.description: 配枪执法官用火器造成重击时，目标必须通过@Check[type:fortitude|dc:18]豁免否则@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}。

Lawbringer.name: 执法者 Lawbringer
Lawbringer.description: 配枪执法官标记一个敌人进行审判，当这名配枪执法官向标记生物的方向移动时，速度有+10尺环境加值。

Hansin.name: Hansin
Hansin.publicNotes:
Cutthroats, killers, thieves, and toughs prey upon the vulnerable of society. Directing their activities and keeping them in line are the duties of the gang leader。

Villains pursue selfish and cruel goals, trampling over anyone foolish or purehearted enough to stand in their way。

Deny Advantage.name: Deny Advantage
Deny Advantage.description: The gang leader isn't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} to creatures of 7th level or lower that are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden}、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected}, flanking, or using surprise attack。

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: When the gang leader rolls a success on a Reflex save, they get a critical success instead。

Nimble Dodge.name: Nimble Dodge
Nimble Dodge.description:
触发 The gang leader is targeted with an attack by an attacker they can see

效果 The gang leader gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack。

Surprise Attack.name: Surprise Attack
Surprise Attack.description: On the first round of combat, if the gang leader rolls Deception or Stealth for initiative, creatures who haven't acted are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} to the gang leader。

Brutal Rally.name: Brutal Rally
Brutal Rally.description:
触发 The gang leader rolls a critical hit against a creature

效果 All allies that can see the gang leader gain a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls until the start of the gang leader's next turn。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.7x0O2GqWBJiAk5PF]{Effect: Brutal Rally}

Gang Up.name: Gang Up
Gang Up.description: Any enemy is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} against the gang leader's melee attacks due to flanking as long as the enemy is within melee reach of both the gang leader and one of the gang leader's allies。

Quick Draw.name: Quick Draw
Quick Draw.description: The gang leader @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interacts} to draw a weapon, then Strikes with that weapon。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description:
The gang leader deals an extra 2d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Headless Rustler.name: Headless Rustler
Headless Rustler.publicNotes:
Riding on a horse as black as night, the headless hunter known as the dullahan tracks down and takes the heads of those it deems unfit to continue living. When closing in for the kill, the dullahan first whispers its victim's name, then swiftly collects its prize, casting a pall of dread upon all who witness the grim execution。

A dullahan manifests when a particularly violent warrior is beheaded and the warrior's soul stubbornly clings to material existence (or is refused entry to the afterlife). Most dullahans return to their former homelands, where they can exact vengeance those they feel wronged them in life (or their living descendants). A dullahan's concept of justice is swift and merciless, and once it has selected a target, it is unwavering in its cause。

Perhaps even more than revenge on the living, a dullahan desires its own rotted head. An individual who wields the head of a dullahan is powerful indeed, for a dullahan will grudgingly serve such a master in the hopes of reclaiming its missing skull. Mighty fiends such as devils command dullahans to harvest souls or lead armies for them, while a mortal might use such an undead warrior to fulfill a personal vendetta. No matter its master's rank or station, however, a dullahan won't hesitate to kill its liege and reclaim its head when the opportunity presents itself。

Most dullahan lairs are abandoned, overgrown ruins or other dilapidated places where severed heads and other trophies line the walls. Some dullahans, on the other hand, are content to simply commit their foul deeds and leave the remains of their decapitated victims in the streets, strewn among a copse of dead trees, or unceremoniously tossed in a bog hole。

Head Hunter.name: Head Hunter
Head Hunter.description: Any slashing weapon a dullahan wields becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.hg3IogR8ue2IWwgS]{Keen}, and any hatchet it wields becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.qlunQzfnzPQpMG6U]{Returning}. If the dullahan kills a creature with a critical hit using a slashing weapon, the target is decapitated as though the dullahan had used Reap on the target. These effects remain only while the dullahan holds the weapon。

Headshot Hunter.name: Headshot Hunter
Headshot Hunter.description: Any firearm wielded by the headless rustler becomes keen (even if it's not a slashing weapon) and striking. If the headless rustler kills a creature with a critical hit using a firearm, the target is treated as if they were decapitated by the headless rustler's Reap ability. These effects remain only while the headless rustler holds the firearm。

Reap.name: Reap
Reap.description: The dullahan removes the head of a dead creature within reach. Each creature within the area of the dullahan's frightful presence must attempt a new save, even if they are temporarily immune。

Summon Steed.name: Summon Steed
Summon Steed.description: The dullahan summons a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Jy2va0NTTbaUH1zP]{War Horse} with elite adjustments and the fiend trait. This steed remains until it is slain, the dullahan Dismisses it, or the dullahan summons another steed。

Throw Skull.name: Throw Skull
Throw Skull.description:
Interact

频率 once (until a new clockwork skull is crafted)

效果 The headless rustler throws its clockwork skull at a target within 30 feet. The skull explodes, dealing [[/r {8d6}[fire]]]{8d6火焰伤害} to creatures in a @Template[type:burst|distance:15]{15-foot radius} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:23|basic:true])。

I.name: I
I.blurb: Genderless alien entity of unknown provenance

Constrict.name: 紧勒 Constrict
Constrict.description:
[[/r {1d8+8}[bludgeoning]]]{1d8+8 Bludgeoning } @Check[type:fortitude|dc:22|basic:true]

Note: A DC was not provided for this ability by Paizo. The DC present here is a moderate DC for the creature level according to the Gamemastery Guide creature building Tables.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.Constrict]

I Venom.name: I Venom
I Venom.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:25]

最大持续时间 6 rounds

阶段1 [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6毒素伤害} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6毒素伤害}, enfeebled 1, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} (1轮)

阶段3 [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6毒素伤害}、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}, and flat‑footed (1轮)

Writhing Arms.name: Writhing Arms
Writhing Arms.description: I makes up to four Strikes with different arms, each against a different target. Each attack counts separately for their multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until all attacks have been made. If I subsequently uses the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Tkd8sH4pwFIPzqTr]{Grab} action, they can Grab any number of creatures they hit with Writhing Arms。

Ibrium.name: Ibrium
Ibrium.blurb: Male human vitrumancer and Nexian agent

Vitrumantic Stoneskin.name: Vitrumantic Stoneskin
Vitrumantic Stoneskin.description:
触发 An adjacent creature Strikes Ibrium with a melee weapon or unarmed attack and deals damage

需求 Ibrium has a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.2BV2yYPfVJ5zirZt]{Stoneskin} spell currently active

效果 Ibrium's unique stoneskin spell manifests as a protective layer of deadly sharp glass. Glass shards burst out from Ibrium's skin, dealing [[/r {3d10}[piercing]]]{3d10穿刺伤害} to the attacker。

Vitrumancy.name: Vitrumancy
Vitrumancy.description: Ibrium has modified certain spells to incorporate glass into their manifestation. Whenever Ibrium casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.sxQZ6yqTn0czJxVd]{Fireball}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.jfVCuOpzC6mUrf6f]{Hydraulic Push}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Rn2LkoSq1XhLsODV]{Pummeling Rubble}, the spell deals slashing damage instead of its normal damage type as the damaging component is replaced with shards of razor-sharp glass。

Ioton (F6).name: 窃思灵云 Ioton (F6)
Ioton (F6).publicNotes:
偶尔，星界中碰撞的杂念会相互纠缠在一起，形成一个具有初步智力的缠结。这些被称为窃思灵云的生物缺乏展现出物理身体的意志力，更没有足够塑造物理身体的自我意识和远见卓识。取而代之的是，它们表现为幽灵般的云状小团，在他们本能地处理周围的环境的同事，会歇性地形成某种短暂的特征，如异形的眼睛、不说话的嘴巴或闪闪发光的符号。它们可能独自会在银海（Silver Sea）中漂流多年。

群居寄生的窃思灵云能感知有思想的生物，并聚集在他们周围，渴望撕下生物的杂念，利用收获的精神能量清晰地思考并形成肉体。窃思灵云可能会理解这个过程会给它的受害者带来痛苦的头痛，但它通常不在乎。不仅大多数这些思诞族陶醉于他们新发现的精神力量并且不愿意放弃这些刚捕获的思维，而且归还被它们窃取的思维本身也剥夺了它们用来判别对错是非所必需的精神带宽。这有时会导致一个痛苦的循环，它反复窃取思想，道歉地放弃它们，然后愉快地重新窃取新思维。

逐渐积累和巩固足够的精神潜力的窃思灵云能形成永久的身体，转化为一种其他类型的思诞族。

星界是主位面的交汇点，将内环位面（Inner Sphere）和外环位面（Outer Sphere）连接起来，这是一个拥有无尽的银色物质的领域，斥着来自整个浩瀚众界（Great Beyond）的精神本质。星界里的大多数生物都是过客——试图从灵魂之河（River of Souls）偷猎的捕食者，防范此类入侵的招魂者，以及监控位面之间原始精华流向的御衡者。然而，这个位面本身产生了一些以奇怪电流和旋涡维生的生物，其中最重要的是由思想产生的生物族类，被称为思诞族。

思诞族在物理形态体现了它所代表的思想和目的。一些思诞族拥有相同的理想和目标，因此他们的形态也较为接近。

Absorbed Language.name: 吸纳语言 Absorbed Language
Absorbed Language.description: 当一个生物受到来自窃思灵云的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续伤害}时，窃思灵云可以说和理解生物所掌握的其中一种语言，随机选择。

Leech Thought.name: 榨取思想 Leech Thought
Leech Thought.description:
当一个生物受到来自窃思灵云的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续心灵伤害}时，窃思灵云会变成目标熟悉的生物的形状，例如熟人、宠物或普通动物，但是外观不够完美，而且在乔装（Impersonate）成某个生物时并不能带来任何好处。

在变形状态下，窃思灵云失去它的虚体特征、免疫和抗力，但它获得一次非武装近战打击，具有[[/r 1d20+6 #Unarmed Strike]]{+6}攻击骰(多次攻击减值[[/r 1d20+1 #Unarmed Strike]]{+1}/[[/r 1d20-4 #Unarmed Strike]]{-4})，造成[[/r {1d8+2}[bludgeoning]]]{1d8+2钝击伤害}。一旦生物不再遭受持续性精神伤害，窃思灵云会立即恢复其原始形态。

Seeking Alchemical Knowledge.name: 渴求炼金术知识 Seeking Alchemical Knowledge
Seeking Alchemical Knowledge.description: 这些窃思灵云渴求炼金术知识。窃思灵云在攻击任何拥有@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.is3Oz9wt11lNq62K]{制作炼金物品 Alchemical Crafting}专长的生物时有+1环境加值，并且他们更喜欢攻击拥有该专长的目标而不是其他目标。

Irkem Dresh.name: 伊尔克姆·德雷什 Irkem Dresh

Defying Glare.name: 反击怒目 Defying Glare
Defying Glare.description:
触发 一个生物对德雷什使用心灵效果，并且失败或大失败；

效果 德雷什对该生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{挫败士气 Demoralizes}；当她如此做时，挫败士气失去听觉特征，获得视觉特征，并且如果生物听不懂她的语言，她不会因此承受减值。

Generous Distraction.name: 慷慨扰乱 Generous Distraction
Generous Distraction.description: 德雷什可以向敌人许诺大笔财富，分散它们的注意力。当她以欺骗检定对30尺内的一个敌人进行@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{虚招 Feint}时，如果成功或大成功，则目标对她的远程攻击和近战攻击都@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}。

Silver Shower Shot.name: 撒币射击 Silver Shower Shot
Silver Shower Shot.description:
频率 每轮一次

效果 德雷什向天上抛洒[[/r 2d6 #Silver pieces]]枚银币，可能会让敌人分心。德雷什进行一次欺骗检定，对30尺内一个可以看见她的生物进行@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{虚招 Feint}。如果燧发手枪装有子弹，德雷什然后对目标进行一次远程燧发手枪打击。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description:
德雷什对措手不及的生物造成额外1d6精准伤害。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Iron Dart Launcher.name: Iron Dart Launcher
Iron Dart Launcher.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:22|name:Disable the trigger|traits:action:disable-a-device](受训)to disable the trigger, or @Check[type:acrobatics|dc:18|name:Squeeze through the door|traits:action:squeeze] to squeeze through the partially opened door (this doesn't disable the trap but prevents it from triggering)
Iron Dart Launcher.hazarddescription: A half‑dozen iron darts fire from spring‑loaded launchers concealed in the desk opposite the front door。
Iron Dart Launcher.reset: The trap resets as soon as the door is closed. It has enough darts to trigger three times, after which, it must be reloaded with 20 darts before it can reset again。

Dart.name: 飞镖 Dart
Dart.description:
触发 The front door is fully opened, Forced Open, or broken

效果 A hail of iron darts launches along a @Template[type:line|distance:20] from the desk through the doorway, dealing [[/r {4d8+10}[piercing]]]{4d8+10穿刺伤害} to each creature in the area of effect (@Check[type:reflex|dc:24|basic:true])。

Kreeth-Ni.name: Kreeth-Ni
Kreeth-Ni.senses: 利用听觉搜索生物+13, 昏暗视觉

+2 Status to Seek Creatures Using Hearin.name: 利用听觉搜索生物时察觉+2状态加值

Speak with Bats.name: Speak with Bats
Speak with Bats.description: Kreeth-Ni can communicate with bats and use Diplomacy to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Make an Impression} on bats and Request things from bats。

Wrath of Spurned Hospitality.name: Wrath of Spurned Hospitality
Wrath of Spurned Hospitality.description: A nyktera whose hospitality is betrayed becomes enraged at the violation of a fundamental aspect of their fey nature. They must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:20] save or begin involuntarily attacking the traitor. At the end of each of their turns, if they choose, they can attempt another Will save to end the effect; otherwise, the effect lasts until the traitor is subdued or leaves the nyktera's presence. As long as their righteous fury lasts, the nyktera gains a +2 status bonus to attack and damage rolls for their fist Strikes。

Bully Effect.name: Bully Effect
Bully Effect.description: The Leadsmith's melee and ranged Strikes deal an additional [[/r {2d6}[bludgeoning]]]{2d6钝击伤害} to creatures that were Shoved within the past round。

Clear A Path.name: Clear A Path
Clear A Path.description:
需求 The Leadsmith is wielding a firearm or crossbow in one hand, and their other hand either wields a one-handed melee weapon or is empty

效果 The Leadsmith makes a melee attack and then reloads their gun in one fluid movement. The Leadsmith makes a one-handed melee weapon Strike or unarmed Strike against an opponent within reach, then Interacts to reload. The Leadsmith doesn't need a free hand to reload in this way。

Private Detective.name: Private Detective
Private Detective.description:
频率 once per小时

效果 The Leadsmith spends 1 minute examining a subject for clues. For the next 24 hours, whenever the Leadsmith makes a Perception check or a skill check using Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma to Recall Knowledge about this subject, the Leadsmith gains a +2 circumstance bonus to the check。

Lonely Machine Spirit.name: 孤单的机魂 Lonely Machine Spirit
Lonely Machine Spirit.disable: @Check[type:religion|dc:22|name:Eject the animating spirit|traits:hazard,haunt,complex](受训)或@Check[type:engineering|dc:20|name:Eject the animating spirit|traits:hazard,haunt,complex]工程学识(受训)放逐炼金引擎中的机魂。作为技能检定的一部分，如果生物说出这艘船的名字“鹰身女妖之吻”，则有+2环境加值。或如果生物说出船长“菲拉·温德斯洛”的名字，则有+4环境加值。作祟会一直保持活动，除非机魂被放逐，或作祟被摧毁，或30尺内没有任何活物。
Lonely Machine Spirit.hazarddescription: 炼金术引擎喷出幽灵般的烟雾，发动机发出刺耳的齿轮摩擦声，仿佛活过来一般。
Lonely Machine Spirit.reset: 作祟停止活动，并在1小时后重置。
Lonely Machine Spirit.routine: (2动作)孤单的机魂使用喷烟能力，或对30尺内的两个生物进行红热齿轮打击。

Painful Whistle.name: 痛苦汽笛 Painful Whistle
Painful Whistle.description:
触发 一个活物接近引擎10尺范围内（在地图上以T标出）；

效果 引擎发出一阵响亮的汽笛声，30尺内所有生物受到[[/r {2d6}[sonic]]]{2d6音波伤害}并陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}（@Check[type:fortitude|dc:20|basic:true|traits:hazard,haunt,complex]豁免，成功不受震慑）。然后孤单的机魂投掷先攻。

Belch Smoke.name: 喷烟 Belch Smoke
Belch Smoke.description:
飞艇引擎喷出@Template[type:cone|distance:30]炼金烟雾。范围内的生物必须尝试@Check[type:fortitude|dc:20|traits:hazard,haunt,complex]豁免。

大成功 生物不受影响。

成功 生物受到[[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}。

失败 生物受到[[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2}。

大失败 生物受到[[/r {3d6}[poison]]]{3d6毒素伤害}和恶心2。

strike-Red hot gear.name: 红热齿轮 Red hot gear

Lyzerium Bottles.name: 利泽元素瓶 Lyzerium Bottles
Lyzerium Bottles.disable: 交互动作捡起五个瓶子中的一个。
Lyzerium Bottles.hazarddescription: 5个装满易挥发绿色液体的玻璃瓶，分散在散落在房间各处，每个玻璃瓶只要碎了就会爆炸。

Explode.name: 爆炸 Explode
Explode.description:
触发 一个生物踩上玻璃瓶或玻璃瓶破损；

效果 玻璃瓶破损，对所在空间内的所有生物造成[[/r {2d8}[fire]]]{2d8火焰伤害}，外加[[/r {2}[persistent,fire]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续火焰伤害}和[[/r {2}[splash,fire]]{2火焰溅射伤害}（@Check[type:reflex|dc:18|basic:true|traits:hazard,mechanical,trap]豁免）。

Get Underfoot.name: Get Underfoot
Get Underfoot.description: Masu Strides up to half her Speed, moving through one or more space occupied by allied creatures, rubbing against and around legs and feet. Each creature whose space Masu moves through is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1} for 1 round。

Echolocation (Precise) 40 feet.name: Echolocation (Precise) 40 feet
Echolocation (Precise) 40 feet.description: A bat can use its hearing as a precise sense at the listed range。

Wing Thrash.name: Wing Thrash
Wing Thrash.description:
触发 An adjacent enemy damages the mutant bat

效果 The bat makes one or two wing Strikes - one against the triggering creature and one against another adjacent creature。

Mutant Desert Drake.name: Mutant Desert Drake
Mutant Desert Drake.publicNotes:
A mutant desert drake often dwells in regions where magic has transformed the desert sands into sheets of glass or growths of strangely growing crystals。

The magic-warping effects of the Mana Wastes extend to the life forces of creatures unfortunate enough to become lost in the cursed desert. Those who undergo the wasteland's most dramatic metamorphoses are referred to as Mana Wastes mutants。

Sensitive Eyes.name: Sensitive Eyes
Sensitive Eyes.description: The mutant desert drake's cluster of extra eyes are connected to a gland that, when punctured, causes the drake to rush into a fury. When a desert drake takes damage from a critical hit, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} for 1 round。

Wing Deflection.name: Wing Deflection
Wing Deflection.description:
触发 The desert drake is targeted with an attack。

效果 The desert drake raises its wing, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. If the desert drake is flying at the time it is attacked, it descends 10 feet after the attack is complete。

Draconic Frenzy.name: 龙之狂怒 Draconic Frenzy
Draconic Frenzy.description: The desert drake makes two Fangs Strikes and one Tail Strike in any order。

Sandstorm Breath.name: Sandstorm Breath
Sandstorm Breath.description: The desert drake spits a ball of electrically charged sand to a range of 60 feet that explodes into a cloud with a @Template[type:burst|distance:15]. Creatures in the area take [[/r {9d6}[electricity]]]{9d6 electricity伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:28|basic:true]). The cloud remains for [[/r 1d4 #Cloud Duration]]{1d4 rounds}, granting Concealment to everything within. The desert drake can't use Sandstorm Breath again for [[/r 1d6 #Sandstorm Breath Recharge]]{1d6 rounds}。

Speed Surge.name: 速度激增 Speed Surge
Speed Surge.description: The desert drake moves up to twice its Speed. It can do this three times per day。

Surprise Attacker.name: Surprise Attacker
Surprise Attacker.description: On the first round of combat, creatures that haven't acted yet are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} to the desert drake。

Mutant Giant Toad.name: Mutant Giant Toad
Mutant Giant Toad.publicNotes:
Mutant giant toads prefer to dwell in polluted refuse heaps, contaminated swaths of sand, or other poisonous wastes. Often afflicted with a vestigial face or limbs, its back is studded with acid-filled pustules。

The magic-warping effects of the Mana Wastes extend to the life forces of creatures unfortunate enough to become lost in the cursed desert. Those who undergo the wasteland's most dramatic metamorphoses are referred to as Mana Wastes mutants。

Poisonous Warts.name: Poisonous Warts
Poisonous Warts.description: Any creature that hits the giant toad with an unarmed Strike or otherwise touches the toad is exposed to giant toad poison。

Giant Toad Poison.name: Giant Toad Poison
Giant Toad Poison.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:20]

最大持续时间 6 rounds

阶段1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied1} (1轮)

阶段2 Stupefied 1 and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} (1轮)

Squirt Acid.name: Squirt Acid
Squirt Acid.description: The mutant giant toad squirts a @Template[type:line|distance:60] of acid from the pustules on its back. Creatures in the area take [[/r {3d6}[acid]]]{3d6酸液伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:20|basic:true]). The mutant giant toad can't Squirt Acid for [[/br 1d4 #Squirt Acid Recharge]]{1d4 rounds}。

Tongue Grab.name: Tongue Grab
Tongue Grab.description:
A creature hit by the giant toad's tongue becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} by the giant toad. The creature isn't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized}, but it can't move beyond the reach of the toad's tongue. A creature can sever the tongue with a successful Strike against AC 15 that deals at least [[/r {6}[slashing]]]{6 slashing伤害}。

This deals no damage to the toad but prevents it from using its tongue Strike until it regrows its tongue, which takes a week。

Ogre Slug.name: Ogre Slug
Ogre Slug.publicNotes:
Ogre gluttons take the act of feeding to a horrific extreme, capable of extending their already cavernous mouths wide enough to gulp down a halfling. Stories of ogre gluttons being tricked into eating razor-edged shields or barrels filled with poisoned meat are common, but such tales are of little consolation to those who have been gobbled down whole by these ravenous giants. In addition to their sadistic table manners, ogre gluttons have a disturbing knack for coming up with violent "games" that are little more than drawn-out torments, yet those who somehow manage to beat a glutton at the rules of its own game can often enrage and frustrate the ogre enough that the resulting tantrum is more than enough distraction to afford a last-ditch escape from doom。

Ogres embody brutish, amoral violence and cruelty. Standing 10 feet tall and densely muscled, ogres are as strong as they are cruel. Ogres are sadists that enjoy remorseless murder, torture, degradation, and mutilation in all of its forms. Although they prefer to vent their violent urges on smaller humanoids-the smaller and more beautiful, the better-ogres promise a horrifying fate for anyone unlucky enough to fall within their meaty grasp. But for all their creativity in developing methods of violence, ogres often remain too dim-witted to realize that their playthings lack an ogre's robust fortitude and high pain tolerance, so most captives die far sooner than the ogres might prefer. Such a fate is perhaps preferable however, as those who survive too long as ogres' playthings suffer lasting mental scars from the horrifying abuse. A captive able to keep their wits can sometimes trick the brutes by promising treasure, meatier captives, or other crude amusements, taking advantage of an ogre's limited intellect to engineer opportunities to escape。

Ogres are social creatures only in the most debased sense. They gather together in groups called families, though members are not always related by blood. Ogres practice incest regularly, believing that it makes for stronger familial bonds, and most ogres are misshapen or mutated from generations of inbreeding. The most powerful ogre in any family is the "boss"-usually the family's patriarch or matriarch-while other ogres in the family learn to obey or risk being brutalized by the boss's loyal kin. Ogres lair in caves, crumbling ruins, or dilapidated shacks close enough to humanoid settlements or animal trails to make raiding easy. These lairs are filthy and frequently contain all-too-recognizable evidence of their depravity。

Glutton's Feast.name: Glutton's Feast
Glutton's Feast.description: If the ogre glutton damages a living creature with their jaws Strike, they gain [[/r 1d4 #Temporary Hit Points]]{1d4 temporary Hit Points} for 1 minute。

Glutton's Rush.name: Glutton's Rush
Glutton's Rush.description: The ogre glutton Strides twice and makes a jaws Strike. If they damage a living creature with this Strike, the temporary Hit Points they receive from Glutton's Feast is increased to [[/r {2d4}[temporary hit points]]]{2d4}。

Throw Powder Keg.name: Throw Powder Keg
Throw Powder Keg.description:
频率 once (until the ogre acquires another powder keg)

效果 The ogre lights and hurls a powder keg of gunpowder at a point within 40 feet. The fuse continues to burn for 1 round, during which time an adjacent creature can use an Interact action to remove the lit fuse, rendering the keg harmless. At the start of the ogre's next turn, if the fuse is still lit, the keg explodes, dealing [[/r {3d8}[fire] + {3d8}[bludgeoning]]]{3d8 fire damage and 3d8钝击伤害} to creatures in a @Template[type:burst|distance:15] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:20|basic:true])。

Crack Shot.name: Crack Shot
Crack Shot.description: When Palzu critically hits a creature with a ranged Strike, the target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:26]豁免否则@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}。

Howling Bullet.name: Howling Bullet
Howling Bullet.description:
需求 Palzu has rolled initiative but hasn't acted yet in combat

效果 Palzu lets loose a blood‑curdling howl while firing his rifle, making the report sound unearthly and disturbing. Palzu makes a Jax Strike against a foe within 40 feet. On a hit, creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] centered on the target hit must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:26] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}。

Rugged Travel.name: Rugged Travel
Rugged Travel.description: Palzu ignores the first square of difficult terrain he moves into each time he Steps or Strides。

equipment-Clockwork Key to Clockwork Bom.name: Clockwork Key to Clockwork Bomb in Area F8

+2 Status to All Saves vs. Disease and M.name: 对抗疾病和心灵效果时全豁免+2状态加值

Clockwork Necromancy.name: Clockwork Necromancy
Clockwork Necromancy.description: Parsus winds their necromechanical innovation (see below) to infuse a corpse-riddled area with necromantic energy. The innovation casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.2w4OpAGihn1JSHFD]{Black Tentacles} on a point within 100 feet, causing the dead body parts in a @Template[type:burst|distance:10] to briefly animate and scrabble at creatures within the area for 1 round。

Explode.name: Explode
Explode.description: Parsus pushes their necromechanical innovation beyond its normal limits, dealing [[/r {10d6}[negative]]]{10d6 negative伤害} in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:31|basic:true]). Parsus can choose to include themself in this effect。

Necromantic Winding.name: Necromantic Winding
Necromantic Winding.description: Parsus winds up their necromechanical innovation. They choose an active effect with the necromancy trait that originated from one of their spells or abilities (such as Clockwork Necromancy). The effect's duration extends to the end of Parsus's next turn。

Necromechanical Innovation.name: Necromechanical Innovation
Necromechanical Innovation.description: Although a necromancer by training, Parsus recently developed a complex device called a necromechanical innovation. This device allows Parsus to use their Clockwork Necromancy, Explode, and Necromatic Winding abilities. It otherwise functions as an inventor weapon innovation with no modifications。

Powderkeg Punk Bombardier.name: 爆桶朋克掷弹手 Powderkeg Punk Bombardier

Blaze of Glory.name: 烈火闪光 Blaze of Glory
Blaze of Glory.description:
触发 爆桶朋克受到火焰伤害；

爆桶朋克对造成火焰伤害的生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{挫败士气 Demoralizes}。此次挫败士气失去听觉特征，获得视觉特征，并且即便目标生物听不懂爆桶朋克的语言，爆桶朋克也不会遭受减值。即便触发的伤害被减少至0，爆桶朋克依然能使用此反应动作。

Bombing Run.name: 边跑边炸 Bombing Run
Bombing Run.description: 掷弹手取出两枚炸弹，然后行走。在此移动之前、移动中途或移动结束时进行两次炸弹打击。

Quick Bomber.name: 快速投弹 Quick Bomber
Quick Bomber.description: 掷弹手能以交互动作取出炸弹，然后用它进行打击。

Shake It Up.name: 摇晃一下 Shake It Up
Shake It Up.description: 投弹手摇晃一瓶炽火胶，然后用它进行打击。此次打击的溅射范围增加到10尺。

Powderkeg Punk Gunner.name: 爆桶朋克枪手 Powderkeg Punk Gunner

Blaze of Glory.name: 烈火闪光 Blaze of Glory
Blaze of Glory.description:
触发 爆桶朋克受到火焰伤害；

爆桶朋克对造成火焰伤害的生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{挫败士气 Demoralizes}。此次挫败士气失去听觉特征，获得视觉特征，并且即便目标生物听不懂爆桶朋克的语言，爆桶朋克也不会遭受减值。即便触发的伤害被减少至0，爆桶朋克依然能使用此反应动作。

Gut Shot.name: 胆量射击 Gut Shot
Gut Shot.description:
频率 每轮一次

需求 枪手被两个或更多生物夹击，并且手枪已经装填；

效果 枪手把枪口对准自己并按下扳机，子弹穿过自己的身体对背后的敌人进行一次出乎意料的打击。枪手对相邻的生物进行一次燧发手枪打击，目标在此次打击中@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}。枪手受到[[/r {1d4}[piercing]]]{1d4穿刺伤害}。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description:
枪手对措手不及的生物造成额外1d6精准伤害。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Toss and Shoot.name: 先丢再射 Toss and Shoot
Toss and Shoot.description:
需求 枪手持握一把已经装填的火器；

效果 枪手以交互动作拿出炽火胶，将其扔向30尺内的一点，然后射击炸弹，在半空中引爆它。炸弹@Template[type:burst|distance:10]{10尺半径}内的生物必须成功通过@Check[type:reflex|dc:15]豁免，否则会受到炽火胶的溅射和持续伤害。

Prairie Drake.name: 草原龙兽 Prairie Drake
Prairie Drake.senses: 震颤感知 30 尺 (模糊感官)
Prairie Drake.publicNotes:
这些矮胖的泥褐色龙兽看起来就像长着鳞片的斗牛犬，带獠牙的嘴部向前突出。已知沙漠龙兽是草原龙兽最为接近的亲族，因为他们都对泥土有很强的亲和力，可以在土壤中挖洞，还能吐出土球砸向敌人。但是沙漠龙兽造型优美，体态灵活，能轻松在风暴和热带气旋中飞行。而草原龙兽则具备一只鸡所具备的所有优雅，甚至几乎无法笨拙地在低矮的山丘或巨石之间扑腾。由于它们的翅膀基本退化完了，所以草原龙兽更喜欢打洞而不是翱翔也就不足为奇了。

草原龙兽的性情类似于以折磨别人为乐的坏孩子。它们躲在土里埋伏小动物，经常在进食之前反复玩弄它们的食物。为了确保自己对其他灌木丛掠食者的霸权，草原龙兽在攻击竞争者时是毫不留情的。它们经常用敌人的尸体做成可怕的图腾，以恐吓其他潜在的竞争者。

草原龙兽生活在领地地下复杂的洞穴内。它们会挖掘较浅的洞穴来寻找大型痋、啮齿动物和地面蛇类。草原龙兽的存在有助于翻土，促进植物生长，从而支撑其他物种的生存环境，让它们成了生态中的关键物种。即便是它们的吐息也会留下肥沃的“龙兽泥球”，农民和园丁都对这种能显著促进植物生长的肥沃土壤趋之若鹜。被当作“有益生物”或“有用物种”的事实激怒了大部分草原龙兽，它们认为这种名声让它们看起来弱爆了，和它们“顶级捕食者”的神秘感完全不匹配。当它们得到太多的正面关注之后，草原龙兽很可能愤而杀死农场里的动物或毁坏农田，只是为了证明自己并不“无害”。

Dirt Breath.name: 泥球吐息 Dirt Breath
Dirt Breath.description: 草原龙兽吐出一个泥球，然后爆炸成岩石和泥浆雨。此攻击射程30尺，爆炸为@Template[type:burst|distance:5]范围。爆发范围内的生物受到[[/r {3d6}[bludgeoning]]]{3d6钝击伤害}（@Check[type:reflex|dc:16|basic:true]豁免）。区域内的植物类生物如果成功豁免则不受伤害；无论豁免结果如何，每天一次，植物类生物可以在区域内花10分钟时间吸收泥土里的养分，恢复[[/r 1d8 #Hit points]]生命值。草原龙兽在[[/br 1d6 #Breath weapon cooldown]]{1d6轮}内无法再次使用泥球吐息。

Draconic Frenzy.name: 龙之狂怒 Draconic Frenzy
Draconic Frenzy.description: 草原龙兽以任意顺序进行一次啃咬打击和两次翼拍打击。

Speed Surge.name: 速度激增 Speed Surge
Speed Surge.description:
频率 每天三次

效果 草原龙兽行走或掘进两次。

Precarious Thunderstone Trap.name: 不稳定的暴雷石陷阱 Precarious Thunderstone Trap
Precarious Thunderstone Trap.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:15|name:Remove the thunderstone|traits:hazard,mechanical,trap](受训)移除暴雷石；或@Check[type:reflex|dc:18|name:Catch the falling thunderstone|traits:hazard,mechanical,trap]豁免接住落下的暴雷石
Precarious Thunderstone Trap.hazarddescription: 当门被打开时，固定在门上的绊线突然崩断，一颗中等暴雷石滚落地面。

Thunderstone.name: 暴雷石 Thunderstone
Thunderstone.description:
触发 大门被推开；

效果 一颗中等暴雷石落在石板上并启动，对大门10 尺内的所有生物造成[[/r {2}[splash,sonic]]]{2音波溅射}伤害。区域内的生物必须通过@Check[type:fortitude|dc:17|traits:hazard,mechanical,trap]豁免否则@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{耳聋 Deafened}1轮。和大门相邻的生物可以尝试接住下落的暴雷石（详见上方解除条目）。

Purple Dye Trap.name: 紫色染料陷阱 Purple Dye Trap
Purple Dye Trap.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:17|name:Remove the jar and thunderstone|traits:hazard,trap,mechanical](受训)小心地移除罐子和暴雷石；或@Check[type:athletics|dc:20|name:Reinforce the flagstone|traits:hazard,trap,mechanical]用临时找来的楔子卡住压力传感器
Purple Dye Trap.hazarddescription: 当压力传感器被触发时，一个装有紫色染料和暴雷石的玻璃罐会从地面弹出并爆炸。

Exploding Jar.name: 爆炸罐子 Exploding Jar
Exploding Jar.description:
触发一个超过50磅重的生物或物体压到南北朝向的石板路（在地图上以T 字标出）；

效果 一个装满紫色染料和一颗中等暴雷石的玻璃罐子从石板之间的地面突然弹出。突然移动导致暴雷石撞击罐子内壁，叮当作响并发生爆炸。@Template[type:burst|distance:10]{10尺半径}内的所有生物受到[[/r {2}[sonic]]]{2音波伤害}，并且必须通过@Check[type:fortitude|dc:17|traits:hazard,trap,mechanical]豁免否则@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{耳聋 Deafened}1轮。此外，区域内的每个生物都会被紫色染料和玻璃碎片射一身，受到[[/r {1d4+2}[piercing]]]{1d4+2穿刺伤害}（@Check[type:reflex|dc:20|basic:true|traits:hazard,trap,mechanical]豁免）。被紫色染料淋到的生物，基于魅力的技能检定有-1环境减值。将沾到染料的头发或衣服完全移除能消除该减值。沾到染料的皮肤经过一周才能褪色，但可以通过@Check[type:deception|dc:12|traits:hazard,trap,mechanical,action:disguise]{易容}检定或合适的化妆品来掩盖。

Pyronite Ooze.name: Pyronite Ooze
Pyronite Ooze.publicNotes:
With the discovery of the incredible gelatinous explosive called pyronite, it was perhaps inevitable alchemical monstrosities made of the stuff would soon follow. So-called pyronite oozes sometimes spontaneously manifest from stockpiles of pyronite or other powerful explosives, typically amid mana storms or when affected by powerful magic。

Pyronite oozes have an extremely unstable life cycle and are defined by their ability to continuously explode and reform themselves. A pyronite ooze's violent explosions hinder observations, making it difficult to learn anything from the volatile jelly. To complicate matters further, pyronite oozes seem drawn to other unstable alchemical concoctions. Test subjects brought to the Spellscar Desert have been observed bathing themselves in pools of magic-polluted effluvia. Although they typically reform into a single entity after exploding, pyronite oozes bathed in chemicals sometimes remain apart after splitting, creating two independent oozes. Some speculate that an as yet unknown reagent must be essential for the oozes to reproduce on their own。

strike-Blast.name: Blast
strike-Blast.description: This can't cause other pyronite oozes to split。

Constant Explosions.name: Constant Explosions
Constant Explosions.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:5] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

[[/r {4d6}[fire]]]{4d6 fire}、@Check[type:reflex|dc:29|basic:true]. This aura can't cause other pyronite oozes to split。

Rejoin.name: Rejoin
Rejoin.description: If two or more Medium pyronite oozes end their turn in adjacent spaces, they merge into a Large pyronite ooze, combining their current Hit Points。

Split.name: Split
Split.description: When a Large pyronite ooze is hit by an attack that would deal bludgeoning or fire damage and it has 10 or more HP, it explodes, dealing [[/r {6d6}[fire]]]{6d6火焰伤害} to creatures in a 10-foot radius (@Check[type:reflex|dc:29|basic:true]). This explosion can't cause other pyronite oozes to split. After exploding, the ooze splits into two Medium pyronite oozes, each with half the original's HP, which each fly through the air and land 15 feet from the original ooze in a random direction. If no space is unoccupied where the ooze would land, it automatically pushes creatures and objects out of the way to fill a space (the GM decides if an object or creature is too big or sturdy to push)。

Exploding Split.name: Exploding Split
Exploding Split.description:
需求 The pyronite ooze is Large

效果 The pyronite ooze explodes in a violent conflagration, dealing [[/r {3d6}[fire]+{3d6}[bludgeoning]]]{3d6 fire and 3d6钝击伤害} to all creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30-foot radius} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:29|basic:true]). This explosion can't cause other pyronite oozes to split. After exploding, the ooze splits into two Medium pyronite oozes (see above), but this splitting doesn't deal additional damage。

Repeater Crossbow Trap.name: 连发弩陷阱 Repeater Crossbow Trap
Repeater Crossbow Trap.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:20|name:Disengage the reloading mechanism|traits:hazard,complex,mechanical,trap](专家)或@Check[type:crafting|dc:20|name:Disengage the reloading mechanism|traits:hazard,complex,mechanical,trap](受训)拆除装填机构；陷阱还能通过F2区域的开关关闭。
Repeater Crossbow Trap.hazarddescription: 走廊地板上的压力板被踩到，导致天花板上有一片镶板垂了下来。装在钢盒里的+1强击重弩会向走廊里的任何生物发射弩矢。
Repeater Crossbow Trap.reset: 陷阱在射完5发弹药之后停止；之后它必须靠人工重新装填。
Repeater Crossbow Trap.routine: (3动作)连发弩陷阱用两个动作装填，然后打击走廊里的一个随机生物。

Auto-Bolter.name: 自动弩机 Auto-Bolter
Auto-Bolter.description:
触发 一个至少重25磅的生物或物品压走廊南部末端的压力板上；

效果 一把装在钢盒子里的+1强击重弩从天花板里伸出来，向走廊上的随机生物开火。然后陷阱投掷先攻。

Roxy.name: 萝克丝 Roxy
Roxy.senses: 震颤感知 30 尺 (模糊感官)
Roxy.publicNotes:
