Dirt Breath.name: 泥球吐息 Dirt Breath
Dirt Breath.description: 草原龙兽吐出一个泥球，然后爆炸成岩石和泥浆雨。此攻击射程30尺，爆炸为@Template[type:burst|distance:5]范围。爆发范围内的生物受到[[/r {3d6}[bludgeoning]]]{3d6钝击伤害}（@Check[type:reflex|dc:16|basic:true]豁免）。区域内的植物类生物如果成功豁免则不受伤害；无论豁免结果如何，每天一次，植物类生物可以在区域内花10分钟时间吸收泥土里的养分，恢复[[/r 1d8 #Hit points]]生命值。草原龙兽在[[/br 1d6 #Breath weapon cooldown]]{1d6轮}内无法再次使用泥球吐息。

Draconic Frenzy.name: 龙之狂怒 Draconic Frenzy
Draconic Frenzy.description: 草原龙兽以任意顺序进行一次啃咬打击和两次翼拍打击。

Speed Surge.name: 速度激增 Speed Surge
Speed Surge.description:
频率 每天三次

效果 草原龙兽行走或掘进两次。

Whipping Wing.name: 翅膀抽打 Whipping Wing
Whipping Wing.description: 萝克丝对触及范围内的敌人进行一次打击。如果造成重击，目标陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded}，直到目标的下个回合结束。

Rust Ooze.name: 锈蚀泥怪 Rust Ooze
Rust Ooze.publicNotes:
城市污染孕育了各种新奇有趣的泥怪。

这些红棕色的球体在下水道和其他水道中蠕动，寻找铁管、金属垃圾和其他会生锈的物体。

Motion Sense 60 feet.name: 运动感知60尺
Motion Sense 60 feet.description: 锈蚀泥怪可以通过振动和空气水的扰动感知附近的生物。

Corrode Weapon.name: 侵蚀武器 Corrode Weapon
Corrode Weapon.description:
触发 锈蚀泥怪被一把近战武器命中；

效果 锈蚀泥怪对该物品造成[[/r {2d6}[acid]]]{2d6酸液伤害}，无视其硬度。

Metal Resistance.name: 金属抗力 Metal Resistance
Metal Resistance.description: 锈蚀泥怪对金属武器有5点抗力。

Rust.name: 锈蚀 Rust
Rust.description: 当锈蚀泥怪的伪足打击造成重击时，它能对目标持握或穿戴的一件金属物品造成[[/r {2d6}[acid]]]{2d6酸液伤害}，无视其硬度。如果一个生物使用一面金属盾牌对锈蚀泥怪的伪足攻击进行盾牌格挡反应动作，该盾牌自动破损，但其他物品不会被锈蚀。

Tetanus.name: 破伤风 Tetanus
Tetanus.description:
破伤风是一种通过伤口创面引起的感染，它会造成僵硬和肌肉痉挛，其强度甚至可能导致骨折，并让患者最终死亡。

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:14]

潜伏期 10天

阶段1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1} (1周)

阶段2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2}并且无法说话 (1天)

阶段3 因肌肉痉挛而陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed} (1天)

阶段4 死亡

Sabora Sharkosa.name: Sabora Sharkosa
Sabora Sharkosa.blurb: Female half-elf martial artist gang leader

Quickest Draw.name: Quickest Draw
Quickest Draw.description:
需求 Sharkosa is aware of at least one of her enemies and not @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}

触发 Sharkosa rolls for initiative

效果 Sharkosa makes two melee Strikes, or draws her pistol and makes a ranged Strike, against an enemy she is aware of。

Concussive Fist.name: Concussive Fist
Concussive Fist.description:
A living creature hit by Sharkosa's knuckle duster must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:23] save。

大成功 The creature is immune to this ability for the next 24 hours。

成功 生物不受影响。

失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} for 1 round。

大失败 The creature is confused for 1 round and falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}。

Golden Bullets.name: Golden Bullets
Golden Bullets.description: Sharkosa's supernatural connection to gold allows her to alter the trajectory of her gold-cased bullets in flight. As long as her target is within 120 feet, Sharkosa gains a +1 circumstance bonus to ranged Strikes against targets with lesser cover and a +2 circumstance bonus to ranged Strikes against targets with standard or greater cover。

One-Two Punch.name: One-Two Punch
One-Two Punch.description: Sharkosa makes three melee Strikes with her knuckle duster. Each Strike counts against her multiple attack penalty as usual。

Reload Trick.name: Reload Trick
Reload Trick.description:
需求 No enemies are within 60 feet of Sharkosa and her dueling pistol is loaded

频率 once per minute

效果 Sharkosa makes two dueling pistol Strikes, reloading after each shot。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description:
Sharkosa deals an extra 2d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Scarecophagus.name: Scarecophagus
Scarecophagus.publicNotes: Originally created by Gebbite necromancers during the war against Nex, the scarecophagus is an evil construct that draws power directly from the undead mummy trapped forever within its sealed core. This necromantic energy is channeled throughout the construct's body, allowing it to scuttle about on legs of stone, animate tentacles to strike at foes, and use the mummy's trapped mind for its own sapience and magical powers。

Magic Sense (Imprecise) 30 feet.name: Magic Sense (Imprecise) 30 feet
Magic Sense (Imprecise) 30 feet.description: The scarecophagus detects the presence of magic items and spell effects within 30 feet as an imprecise sense。

Despair.name: Despair
Despair.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

Living creatures are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1} while in a scarecophagus' despair aura. They can't naturally recover from this fear while in the emanation but recover instantly once they leave it. When a creature first enters the emanation, it must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:22] save (after taking the penalty from being frightened 1) or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed} for 1 round. The creature is then temporarily immune to this paralysis for 24 hours。

Disgorge Mummy.name: Disgorge Mummy
Disgorge Mummy.description: If a scarecophagus is reduced to 0 Hit Points by any damage other than positive energy, it cracks open as it's destroyed, allowing the undead mummy trapped for eons within its core to rise. This is a weak @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.E5RDV3n7GnjAspQ5]{Mummy Guardian}; if the mummy guardian survives on its own for a month, it loses the weak adjustment. If the scarecophagus is reduced to 0 Hit Points by positive energy, it cracks open as it's destroyed and the mummy within turns to dust, destroyed as well。

Vulnerable to Positive Energy.name: Vulnerable to Positive Energy
Vulnerable to Positive Energy.description: A scarecophagus takes damage from positive energy as if it were an undead creature。

Sarcophagus.name: Sarcophagus
Sarcophagus.description: Until the next time it acts, the scarecophagus appears to be a normal stone sarcophagus. It has an automatic result of 34 on Deception checks and DCs to pass as a sarcophagus。

Shifting Scuttle.name: Shifting Scuttle
Shifting Scuttle.description:
频率 once per turn

效果 The scarecophagus Steps up to 10 feet。

Second Kiss Engine.name: Second Kiss Engine
Second Kiss Engine.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:28|name:Disable the engine|traits:action:disable-a-device](专家)to disable the engine, or @Check[type:engineering-lore|dc:26|name:Disengage the drive shaft] to disengage the drive shaft. Either method disables the trap but also shuts down the engine, disabling the Second Kiss's propulsion。
Second Kiss Engine.hazarddescription: Exposed clockwork gears spin at high speeds。

Spinning Gears.name: Spinning Gears
Spinning Gears.description:
触发 A creature Strides in the engine nacelle

效果 The creature's clothing or limbs get caught in the spinning gears and axles of the engine. The creature must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:24] save。

大成功 生物不受影响。

成功 The creature takes [[/r {2d8+9}[bludgeoning]]]{2d8+9钝击伤害}。

失败 The creature takes [[/r {4d8+18}[bludgeoning]]]{4d8+18钝击伤害}。

大失败 The creature's clothing is pulled into the clockworks. The creature takes [[/r {4d8+18}[bludgeoning]]]{4d8+18钝击伤害} and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained}. Until the creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escapes} (DC 24), it takes [[/r {2d8+9}[bludgeoning]]]{2d8+9钝击伤害} each round as it's pulled into the spinning rotors. A creature wearing clothing can automatically Escape by doffing its caught clothing; this destroys the doffed clothing。

Shock Zombie.name: Shock Zombie
Shock Zombie.publicNotes: Shock zombies are hideous undead covered with bolts and electrical wiring. Most have two large electric coils mounted on their backs to absorb and project electricity. If uncontrolled, shock zombies often wander far afield in search of inventors' labs or lightning storms to draw power from. In a pinch, the natural electric currents inside living creatures more than suffice。

Electricity Absorption.name: Electricity Absorption
Electricity Absorption.description: For 1 minute after taking electricity damage, a shock zombie loses its usual @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} condition, gains the ability to use reactions, and gains a +10-foot status bonus to its Speed。

Lightning Powered.name: Lightning Powered
Lightning Powered.description: Arcs of restorative electricity jolt between shock zombies. For each shock zombie within 30 feet, the shock zombie gains fast healing 2 (to a maximum of fast healing 10)。

Slow.name: Slow
Slow.description: A shock zombie is typically @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} and can't use reactions (but see electricity absorption)。

Shoma Lyzerius.name: 邵马·利泽留斯 Shoma Lyzerius

Infused Items.name: 灌注物品 Infused Items
Infused Items.description: 利泽留斯携带2瓶@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.SgtqZxt26BdjUmEB]{中等强酸瓶 Acid Flask (Moderate)}、2瓶@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.97QyNEOAyYLdGaYc]{中等瓶装闪电 Bottled Lightning (Moderate)}、2瓶@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.TZUskLT7yvP7N2co]{次等生命灵药 Elixir of Life (Lesser)}、6瓶中等利泽元素，和2个@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.T6Appwwl6nUl56Xj]{次等绊足包 Tanglefoot Bag (Lesser)}。这些物品持续24 小时，或直到他下次进行日常准备。他能花费一个动作创造额外的这些炼金物品，或任何他炼金公式簿中所列出的物品。

Far Lob.name: 远投手 Far Lob
Far Lob.description: 利泽留斯的炸弹射程增量为30尺（代替原本的20尺）。

Firebug.name: 纵火狂 Firebug
Firebug.description: 利泽留斯的炼金物品在打击成功命中后造成额外[[/r {1}[fire]]]{1火焰伤害}。

Natural-Born Burner.name: 天生纵火犯 Natural-Born Burner
Natural-Born Burner.description: 利泽留斯所使用的任何近战武器造成额外[[/r {1d6}[fire]]]火焰伤害。

Quick Bomber.name: 快速投弹者 Quick Bomber
Quick Bomber.description: 利泽留斯能以交互动作拿出炸弹，然后立即用它进行打击。

Skeletal Crocodile.name: Skeletal Crocodile
Skeletal Crocodile.publicNotes:
Huge giants and other enormous creatures make powerful skeletons。

Made from bones held together by foul necromancy, skeletons are among the most common types of undead, found haunting old dungeons and forgotten cemeteries。

Broad Swipe.name: Broad Swipe
Broad Swipe.description: The crocodile makes two Strikes with its tail against two adjacent foes, both of whom are within its reach. The multiple attack penalty does not increase until after both attacks are resolved。

Reconfigure.name: Reconfigure
Reconfigure.description: Part machine and part skeleton, the crocodile reconfigures its mechanical components, either reducing its size to Large or returning its size to Huge if it is currently Large。

Skull Shot.name: Skull Shot
Skull Shot.description: The skeletal crocodile detaches its skull and fires it at a target within 30 feet, making a bite Strike. If the Strike is successful and the target is Large or smaller, the crocodile uses a heavy chain to retract its skull back to its body, dragging the targeted creature 30 feet。

Slick.name: Slick
Slick.publicNotes: Giant chameleons are legendary for their ability to change their skin color in response to their surroundings. Their eyes are capable of peering in different directions independently, making them almost as difficult to sneak up on as they are to notice in the first place。

Camouflage.name: Camouflage
Camouflage.description: The giant chameleon can change its coloration to match its surroundings. It doesn't need cover to attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide} with a Stealth check。

Tongue Grab.name: Tongue Grab
Tongue Grab.description: If the giant chameleon hits a creature with a tongue Strike, that creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} by the giant chameleon. The target isn't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized}, but it can't move beyond the reach of the giant chameleon's tongue. A creature can sever the tongue with an attack that hits AC 15 and deals at least 4 slashing damage. Though this doesn't deal any damage to the giant chameleon, it prevents it from using its tongue Strike until it regrows its tongue, which takes a week。

Weeping Wounds.name: 流脓伤口 Weeping Wounds
Weeping Wounds.description: 污刺身上脓包里的脓液对其他生物有害。当一个生物用近战攻击命中污刺杀手时，攻击者必须通过DC 14 反射豁免，否则受到1 点酸液伤害（大失败受到2 点酸液伤害）@Check[type:reflex|dc:14] save or take [[/r {1}[acid]]]{1酸液伤害} ([[/r {2}[acid]]]{2酸液伤害} on a critical failure)。

Pack Attack.name: 群起攻之 Pack Attack
Pack Attack.description: 豺狼人对任何至少在两名豺狼人盟友触及范围内的目标造成额外1d4伤害。

Stealthy Abduction.name: 偷偷拐走 Stealthy Abduction
Stealthy Abduction.description: 当污刺杀手成功@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{擒抱 Grapples}一个生物时，生物无法发出声音；其他生物无法只通过听觉注意到有人被擒抱。只要生物被擒抱，它就无法使用带有声音特征的动作，或施放带有语言成分的法术。

Smog Giant.name: Smog Giant
Smog Giant.publicNotes:
Corrupting magical storms and the interference of unethical gear- smiths birthed the first of the so-called smog giants. These hot-tempered behemoths all originate from a clan of unfortunate hill giants which became so attuned to their strange environment they developed unique mutations and incredibly violent dispositions. For all their physical abnormalities, it's still fair to say the violent confrontations common along the Western Ravage are the true cause of smog giants' monstrous nature。

Smog giants can eat meat and bone, but they prefer diets of black powder and the raw materials that make up this alchemical concoction. Their bodies store repositories of the stuff infused with the unstable occult energies that lace their flesh, granting them the ability to "crack" these pockets of subdermal explosives when they attack, much like a tough cracking their knuckles during a fight. In this case however, the results are much more violent—especially when coupled with the large quantities of weaponized body piercings and adornments smog giants often wear。

Explosive Headbutt.name: Explosive Headbutt
Explosive Headbutt.description:
The smog giant cracks their neck, triggering pockets of black powder at the base of their skull to impart additional power to their attack. The giant then attempts a headbutt Strike. This counts as two attacks when calculating the giant's attack penalty. If this Strike hits, it deals [[/r {2d10+8}[bludgeoning]]]{2d10+8钝击伤害} and the creature struck must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:25] save。

大成功 The creature suffers no additional effect。

成功 The creature takes an additional [[/r {1d10}[bludgeoning]]]{1d10钝击伤害}。

失败 The creature takes an additional [[/r {2d10}[bludgeoning]]]{2d10钝击伤害} and is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone} if it's Large or smaller。

大失败 As failure, but without a size limit。

Shrapnel.name: Shrapnel
Shrapnel.description: A smog giant has a dozen implanted knives, rocks, chunks of metal, spikes, and other adornments that they can fire from their body with great force to make ranged shrapnel Strikes. Once a smog giant has used all 12 shots, they must replace them one at a time using a 1-minute Interact activity。

Smog Wraith.name: Smog Wraith
Smog Wraith.publicNotes:
Clouds of choking fumes and toxic smog continuously shroud these potent undead. They constantly belch forth noxious vapors and find great humor in the death of creatures too weak to resist their vile fumes. These fetid vapors are so dense the corpses of a smog wraith's victims can float among them。

Though it's possible to create smog wraiths through necromancy, most are the result of industrialists, inventors, and polluters who in life relished opportunities to exploit nature for profit, power, or prestige. In death, these wretched souls can rise as smog wraiths to continue their spoliation。

Floating Corpses.name: Floating Corpses
Floating Corpses.description: A smog wraith's victims are imbued with an eerie buoyancy; corpses of such creatures float up to 30 feet in the air while inside the wraith's noxious smog aura, though the wraith has no control over the corpse's movement。

Noxious Smog.name: Noxious Smog
Noxious Smog.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

Creatures within the aura are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed}, and creatures outside the aura are concealed to creatures within it. A creature that ends its turn within the aura must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:25] save。

大成功 生物不受影响。

成功 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}。

失败 The creature is sickened 1 and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} while within the cloud。

大失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2} and slowed 1 while within the cloud。

Sunlight Powerlessness.name: Sunlight Powerlessness
Sunlight Powerlessness.description: A smog wraith caught in sunlight is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2}。

Smog Wrait Spawn.name: Smog Wrait Spawn
Smog Wrait Spawn.description: A living humanoid slain by a smog wraith's noxious hand Strike rises as a smog wraith spawn after [[/r 1d4 #Rounds]]{1d4 rounds}. This spawn is under the command of the smog wraith that killed it. It doesn't have noxious smog or smog wraith spawn and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2} for as long as it's a smog wraith spawn. If the creator of the spawn dies, the spawn becomes a full-fledged, autonomous smog wraith; it regains its free will, gains smog wraith spawn and noxious smog, and is no longer clumsy。

Acidic Pustules.name: Acidic Pustules
Acidic Pustules.description: The marauder's skin is covered with necrotic boils that burst when struck. Whenever a creature deals slashing or piercing damage to the marauder, each creature within 5 feet takes [[/r {2d6}[acid]]]{2d6酸液伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:22|basic:true]). On a critically failed save, a creature also takes [[/r {1d4}[persistent,acid]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续酸液伤害}。

Runic Resistance.name: Runic Resistance
Runic Resistance.description:
触发 The marauder takes damage from a Strike or spell effect

效果 The marauder's protective runic tattoos glow, granting them resistance 5 to one damage type dealt by the triggering attack。

This resistance applies against the triggering effect and lasts for 1 minute or until the marauder uses this ability again, whichever comes first. If the triggering effect deals multiple damage types, the marauder chooses which type to resist。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.P4bNtDVyknQwjTPo]{Effect: Runic Resistance}

Mana Fever.name: Mana Fever
Mana Fever.description:
A creature can't remove the fatigued condition while infected

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:22]

潜伏期 1 day

阶段1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1} (1天)

阶段2 fatigued and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2} (1天)

阶段3 fatigued and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 3} (1天)

阶段4 gain immunity to mana fever and become a Mana Wastes mutant

Paired Strike.name: Paired Strike
Paired Strike.description:
需求 The maftet is wielding two scimitars

效果 The maftet makes two Strikes against the same target, one with each of their scimitars. The maftet combines the damage of any attacks that hit and applies resistances and weaknesses only once. This counts as one attack when calculating the maftet's multiple attack penalty。

Powerful Scimitars.name: Powerful Scimitars
Powerful Scimitars.description: Any non-magical scimitar becomes a +1 striking scimitar while a spellscar sky marauder wields it。

Raptor Dive.name: Raptor Dive
Raptor Dive.description:
需求 The marauder is flying at least 10 feet above the target

效果 The marauder Flies up to twice their fly Speed and makes a Paired Strike at the end of the movement. If both Strikes hit, the target is also knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}。

Steaming Kingdom Bartender.name: Steaming Kingdom Bartender
Steaming Kingdom Bartender.publicNotes:
Barkeeps are often friends and mentors within a community, lending an ear while supplying libations. The best barkeeps have some talent for storytelling and passing on valuable advice。

Countless adventures begin in a tavern or a pub. Maybe it's because such places attract the risk-prone, or maybe it's because everyone needs a little liquid courage before they decide to take on a group of rampaging ogres。

Bar Brawler.name: Bar Brawler
Bar Brawler.description: The barkeep has been in enough bar fights to know how to throw a few punches. When fighting in their bar and making a nonlethal attack, the barkeep gains a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls and deals an additional [[/r {1d4}]]{1d4伤害}。

Barkeep's Advice.name: Barkeep's Advice
Barkeep's Advice.description:
频率 once per day

效果 The barkeep gives some pertinent advice to a single creature other than themself. For 24 hours, when that creature fails a skill check or saving throw, they can recall this advice and reroll the check, using the second result instead. Once that creature uses this ability, its effect ends。

A creature that receives the Barkeep's Advice is temporarily immune to the ability for 1 month。

Stink-Sap Trap.name: 恶臭树液陷阱 Stink-Sap Trap
Stink-Sap Trap.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:15|name:Clog the nozzle|traits:hazard,mechanical,trap](受训)堵上喷嘴；或@Check[type:athletics|dc:14|name:Redirect the stream|traits:hazard,mechanical,trap](受训)改变喷嘴的方向，让它对着石板路旁边喷；此运动检定可以通过远程投掷一件物品的方式来实现，但如果大失败的话会触发喷嘴的突然喷射。
Stink-Sap Trap.hazarddescription: 石板路下面的压力传感器连接着有一个喷嘴，喷出黏稠且臭气熏天的树液。
Stink-Sap Trap.reset: 1分钟。在储存罐里的树液用完之前，陷阱能自动重置2次。

Sudden Spray.name: 突然喷射 Sudden Spray
Sudden Spray.description:
触发 一个超过50磅重的生物或物体压到大门后方的石板路（在地图上以T 字标出）；

效果 喷嘴喷出恶臭的树液，让@Template[type:cone|distance:15]区域内的所有生物身上包裹一层黏液。区域内的生物如果未能通过@Check[type:reflex|dc:20|traits:hazard,mechanical,trap]豁免则会暴露在恶臭树液的影响下。

Stink Sap.name: 恶臭树液 Stink Sap
Stink Sap.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:5] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

生物和他们的装备包裹在难闻的树液中。在此灵光范围内的生物必须尝试@Check[type:fortitude|dc:16|traits:hazard,mechanical,trap]豁免。如果失败，生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}，并且如果大失败，生物还会陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}。只要生物待在灵光范围内，生物从恶心状态中恢复的豁免骰就有-2环境减值。通过豁免的生物对恶臭树液临时免疫1分钟。在探索模式下，生物不需要对此效果进行豁免，也不会获得临时免疫，但身上有恶臭树液的角色必须在遭遇模式开始投掷先攻时对自身的灵光进行豁免。被沾上的树液能持续存在10小时；花费10分钟用肥皂和水用力擦洗自己可以减少1小时持续时间。

Subduing Gas Chamber.name: 毒气卧室 Subduing Gas Chamber
Subduing Gas Chamber.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:26|name:Disconnect the wire|traits:hazard,complex,mechanical,trap](受训)断开连接配重的电线，防止其下落；或@Check[type:crafting|dc:20|name:Create a counteragent|traits:hazard,complex,mechanical,trap,alchemical,action:craft]（炼金手艺）制造一种对抗催眠气体的药剂
Subduing Gas Chamber.hazarddescription: 书桌抽屉里的一个机械传感器施放墙壁上的一个配重，把门砰地关上，同时打开床铺下的储罐，让气体充满这个密闭的房间，发出嘶嘶的声音。
Subduing Gas Chamber.routine: (1动作)每一轮轮到陷阱行动时，陷阱会向房间内注入更多催眠气体。房间内任何需要呼吸的生物都暴露在毒素影邵马的人造人 响下。如果一个生物在第一轮先于陷阱行动，它可以选择屏住呼吸来推迟吸入毒药——在陷阱第一轮之后屏住呼吸没有效果，因为生物肺部的空气已经被毒气污染了。陷阱在气体耗尽之前能工作一分钟，气体在接下来的1分钟内会迅速衰减。打开相邻的房门可以减少气体衰变所需的剩余时间，但也会让该房间内的生物同样暴露在毒气中。

Slam Door.name: 砰然关门 Slam Door
Slam Door.description:
触发 一个生物在没有按住桌子下面施放按钮的情况下打开了书桌抽屉；

效果 房间的木门砰的一声关上并上锁，然后陷阱投掷先攻。

Sleeping Gas.name: 催眠气体 Sleeping Gas
Sleeping Gas.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:22|traits:hazard,complex,mechanical,trap]

最大持续时间 4小时

阶段1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} (1轮)

阶段2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious}，且不能通过察觉检定醒来 (1轮)

阶段3 失去意识，且不能通过察觉检定醒来 (1小时)

Swee Pup.name: Swee Pup
Swee Pup.publicNotes:
Soulbound dolls are eerie mannequins or playthings that have been imbued with a small piece of a deceased mortal's soul. These little constructs are created for a variety of reasons-such as to serve as companions or servants-but their free will means their obedience to their creators is hardly a given. Followers of Pharasma generally abhor soulbound dolls, viewing them as a perversion of the natural cycle of souls, and those who worship the Lady of Graves see the destruction of a soulbound doll, regardless of the construct's alignment, as an important service to the Great Beyond. Soulbound dolls are the simplest in a series of soulbound constructs including human-sized soulbound mannequins, powerful soulbound shells, and sentinel soulbound terra-cotta warriors. Creating them from unwilling living creatures is evil, and an unwilling donor can resist the process with a successful Will save against the creator's Craft DC, ruining the doll if not preventing the donor's death. A non-evil doll can only be crafted from the soul of a person who has given consent to such use before their death occurred

Soulbound dolls encountered by adventurers are typically guardians of some sort; despite their diminutive size, the soul fragment's power makes the doll's flst more dangerous than a casual observer would expect. Further, it grants the doll a single spell of outsized power given its stature. Because of their autonomy and remarkable intelligence, soulbound dolls are occasionally employed by their crafters as administrators over much more powerful but mindless constructs such as golems, allowing such dolls to control defenses far beyond their own capabilities. Though soulbound dolls contain a small fragment of a soul extracted during or shortly after a person's death, this doesn't affect the deceased's resurrection or progress to the afterlife. This extraction process is lethal to otherwise-living prospective soul donors, though there are rumors of more expensive processes that allows someone to donate a fragment of a living soul without repercussions。

The soul fragment resides in a soul focus gem typically embedded in the doll's neck or chest. The soul fragment isn't static, and the doll continues to learn from its initial state, meaning its personality and abilities can change, possibly growing closer to the donor's or moving farther afield on its own individual path. The soulbound doll's focus gem retains the doll's memories even after the doll's destruction. The the intact soul focus gem of a destroyed doll can even be placed into a new doll body by someone knowledgeable in the creation of soulbound creatures, effectively reconstituting the soulbound doll。

Broken Legs.name: Broken Legs
Broken Legs.description: Swee Pup's lower half doesn't function as a result of damage sustained, reducing its Speed to 0 feet. Repairing such a complex and rare prototype is beyond the ability of anyone but Kosowana without months of research。

Personality Fragments.name: Personality Fragments
Personality Fragments.description: A soulbound doll shares fragments of its donor soul's personality, though none of that creature's memories. This causes a soulbound doll to match the donor soul's alignment and gain the corresponding alignment traits。

Lamp Vision 30 feet.name: Lamp Vision 30 feet
Lamp Vision 30 feet.description: The Claws of Time is specially attuned to the crystal lamps in the Cradle of Quartz. It can sense creatures within 30 feet of any crystal lamp in the Cradle of Quartz. These lamps are marked as glowing blue dots on the map. This is a precise sense。

Otherworldly Mind.name: Otherworldly Mind
Otherworldly Mind.description: Whenever a creature targets the hound with a mental effect, that creature takes [[/r {4d6}[mental]]]{4d6 mental伤害} (@Check[type:will|dc:29|basic:true] save). On a critical failure, it also becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}。

Ripping Gaze.name: Ripping Gaze
Ripping Gaze.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

The Claws of Time's eyes glow balefully, causing painful but bloodless wounds to rip open in the body of a creature that meets its awful gaze. When a creature ends its turn in the aura's emanation, it takes [[/r {6d6}[slashing]]]{6d6 slashing伤害} (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:29|basic:true] save)。

A creature that critically succeeds at its save is temporarily immune for 24 hours。

Vulnerable to Curved Space.name: Vulnerable to Curved Space
Vulnerable to Curved Space.description: When a hound of Tindalos is not adjacent to a structural angle of 90º (or more acute), its resistance to physical damage is suppressed and it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}. It can't recover from this sickened condition, but the condition ends automatically once the hound is again adjacent to a suitable angle。

Angled Entry.name: Angled Entry
Angled Entry.description:
The Claws of Time casts a 4th‑level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.VlNcjmYyu95vOUe8]{Dimension Door} spell, but it must transport itself into a space adjacent to an angle of 90º (or more acute) in the structure or environment around it. This means the hound can use dimension door to appear adjacent to any wall or corner in the Cradle of Quartz except for the central geode (area D16)。

Once per day, the hound can use this ability to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.5bTt2CvYHPvaR7QQ]{Plane Shift} to or from the Dimension of Time, with the same restrictions on what angles next to which it can appear。

Trapjaw Tangle.name: Trapjaw Tangle
Trapjaw Tangle.publicNotes:
Sometimes the best intentions result in dire consequences and even a successful project can turn into an unending nightmare. Such is the grim tale of the first trapjaw tangles. These mechanical swarms were initially created as a solution to the pestilence of mutated rodents that plagued Alkenstar. These mobile rat traps, bound together by a magical matrix of occult energy, were programmed to wait in ambush or chase down their prey. The first trapjaw tangles proved effective and their creators were well rewarded for their ingenious designs. Soon trapjaw tangles were deployed throughout Alkenstar, Martel, and the Gunworks. Waves of them would be sent to roam into the Spellscar Desert, and the ever-present vermin were quickly forgotten。

Then disaster struck. A rogue wave of magical energy washed over an airship that carried a trapjaw tangle in its hold. The magical affliction scrambled the tangle's programming and gave the swarm just enough intellect to send it on a red frenzy through the ship. When the airship crashed into the outskirts of Alkenstar, its crew perished but the infected tangle survived to infect every trapjaw it met with the same deadly scrambling of magic. Now, trapjaw tangles are an even greater menace to society than the vermin they were originally designed to eradicate。

Cling.name: Cling
Cling.description:
触发 A creature leaves the trapjaw tangle's space

效果 The swarm takes [[/r 1d6]]{1d6伤害} as individual traps cling to the creature and continue chewing, dealing [[/r {2d10}[persistent,slashing]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续 Slashing伤害}. High winds or electricity damage reduces the DC of the flat check to end this persistent damage by 5. Any area damage dealt to the creature destroys these clinging trapjaws。

Snapping Jaws.name: Snapping Jaws
Snapping Jaws.description: Each enemy in the swarm's space takes [[/r {2d10}[slashing]]]{2d10 slashing伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:22|basic:true]). Creatures that fail this save become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1} from the numerous painful wounds caused by the swarm。

Trip and Tangle.name: Trip and Tangle
Trip and Tangle.description:
需求 A creature in the trapjaw tangle's space took damage from the swarm during this轮

效果 The trapjaw tangle attempts an @Check[type:athletics|traits:trip-tangle] check with a +10 modifier against the creature's Fortitude DC. On a success, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} until the start of the trapjaw tangle's next turn. On a critical success, the creature also falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}。

Flash of Insight.name: Flash of Insight
Flash of Insight.description:
触发 Vewslog is about to roll a d20

频率 once per day

效果 The cyclops peers into an occluded spectrum of possible futures. He gets a success (but not a critical success) on the roll instead of rolling。

Pistolero's Retort.name: Pistolero's Retort
Pistolero's Retort.description:
触发 A foe within 60 feet critically fails an attack roll against Vewslog

效果 Vewslog makes a dueling pistol Strike against the triggering foe。

Deadeye.name: Deadeye
Deadeye.description: Vewslog's ranged attacks deal an additional 4d6 precision damage。

Firearms Critical Specialization.name: 火器重击专精 Firearms Critical Specialization
Firearms Critical Specialization.description: When Vewslog 用火器造成重击时，目标必须通过a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:25] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}。

Ricochet.name: Ricochet
Ricochet.description:
频率 每轮一次

效果 Vewslog makes a ranged Strike and compares the attack roll result to the AC of up to two foes, each of whom must be within 60 feet of Vewslog. Roll damage only once and apply it to each creature hit. A ricochet counts as two attacks for Vewslog's multiple attack penalty。

Volatile Reagents.name: 不稳定的试剂 Volatile Reagents
Volatile Reagents.disable: Three @Check[type:acrobatics|dc:20|name:Sort and separate the ingredients|traits:alchemical,hazard,complex,environmental]或@Check[type:crafting|dc:20|name:Sort and separate the ingredients|traits:alchemical,hazard,complex,environmental]将装有挥发性试剂的瓶子分门别类地放好。
Volatile Reagents.hazarddescription: 药水瓶、蒸馏器具和各种烈性试剂混合在一起时意外产生了剧烈的爆炸。
Volatile Reagents.reset: 实验室里有足够多的材料，在耗尽之前，危害最多能持续1分钟。或者，一旦小滑头缩小到正常大小，危害就会被重置。
Volatile Reagents.routine: (1动作)盖特比实验室内一块随机10 尺方格发生爆炸，对区域内的生物和物体造成[[/r 2d6]]伤害(@Check[type:reflex|dc:18|basic:true|traits:alchemical,hazard,complex,environmental])。伤害类型每轮随机决定：酸液、寒冷、电击、火焰、挥砍或音波。

Explosive Catalyst.name: 爆炸性试剂 Explosive Catalyst
Explosive Catalyst.description:
触发 小滑头喝下盖特比的生长液；

效果 巨大的蜥蜴在炼金台上横冲直撞，导致试剂混合在一起。然后危害投掷先攻。

Wooden Bullets Trap.name: 木质子弹陷阱 Wooden Bullets Trap
Wooden Bullets Trap.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:17|name:reinforce the porch sensor|traits:complex,hazard,trap,mechanical](受训)卡死压力传感器；或@Check[type:crafting|dc:15|name:Cover the holes|traits:complex,hazard,trap,mechanical](受训)堵住发射子弹的洞。
Wooden Bullets Trap.hazarddescription: 一个填满木质子弹的漏斗被固定在一个发射器上，发射器会从钉死窗户的木板上的洞里高速射出子弹。听到一声独特的“咔哒”声和呼呼声表明陷阱已经启动。
Wooden Bullets Trap.reset: 陷阱将在运行10轮或压力板上的负载被移除后停止，二者以先发生的为准。在重新装填之前，陷阱总共能攻击10轮。
Wooden Bullets Trap.routine: (2动作)木质子弹陷阱打击最近的两个生物。由于发射器的高度，它无视@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}的生物。

Auto-Sling.name: 自动发射器 Auto-Sling
Auto-Sling.description:
触发 一个超过50磅重的生物或物体压到门口的压力板在地图上以T 字标出）；

效果 发射器射出木质子弹雨。陷阱打击最近的两个生物然后投掷先攻。

Yeast Ooze.name: 酵母泥怪 Yeast Ooze
Yeast Ooze.publicNotes:
野生酵母和炼金术结合在一起形成了这种可怕的泛着泡沫的泥怪。

城市污染孕育了各种新奇有趣的泥怪。

Motion Sense 60 feet.name: 运动感知60尺
Motion Sense 60 feet.description: 酵母泥怪可以通过振动和空气水的扰动感知附近的生物。

Monstrous Yeast.name: 可怕酵母 Monstrous Yeast
Monstrous Yeast.description:
当一个感染可怕酵母的生物受到寒冷伤害时，它可以立即尝试一次新的豁免，并且该次豁免有+2环境加值。该次豁免失败不会推进疾病的阶段；

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:16]

潜伏期 1轮

阶段1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} (1小时)

阶段2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1}和措手不及 (1小时)

阶段3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}和措手不及 (1天)
